1.content: So then, which Digimon series will we focus on for this story?
1.title: Select the series

11.content:
In a part of the Digital World, currently lying on the ground was a small, mysterious object. It looked to be a small tablet that could easily fit in a person's palm. It looked just like one of the crests that the Digidestined possessed, with the symbol on it resembling a question mark. This mysterious object was even stranger than most others found in the Digital World, and would cause very strange things to happen to those that found it.

And this crest with strange powers was about to be found, and the one to find it would be the DigiDestined

The DigiDestined:
Tai and Agumon
Matt and Gabumon
Sora and Biyomon
Izzy and Tentomon
Joe and Gomamon
Mimi and Palmon
T.K. and Patamon
Kari and Gatomon
11.title: Season 1/Adventure

111.content:
It was currently a quiet and peaceful for the Digidestined as they walked through the Digital World. To their relief, they hadn't been attacked lately, and nothing too bad had happened to them. As they did, they all suddenly heard a beeping noise coming from their Digivices.

"Woah, whats going on?" Tai questioned as he and the others all reached for their Digivices to see why they were suddenly acting like they were.

"I don't know." Sora replied.

As they all checked their Digivices, they saw some flashing lights on their screen that represented them, and another one that appeared to be a distance away from them. "It looks like their showing us something is nearby." Izzy said.

"But the question is, what?" Matt said.

"Should we check it out?" T.K. asked.

"I don't know. It might be too dangerous. I say we should ignore it." Joe said.

"You think everything is too dangerous, Joe." Gomamon said.

"If our Digivices are telling us where something is, that probably means we should check it out." Tai said.

"Or maybe its telling us we should avoid it." Matt said.

"Maybe we should check it out." Izzy said. "Whether its dangerous or not, right now we have no way of knowing what the case is here."

"And you don't have to worry about any danger with us here." Agumon said.

"So then its decided." Tai said. And with that, they all made their way to the location that was being shown to them by their Digivices. When they did, they found themselves in a clearing.

"This is the place, but I don't see anything out of the ordinary." Sora said.

"We should probably check around then." Tentomon said. "Maybe we'll find something if we look."

And at his suggestion, the group all spread out to look for anything that might catch their eye as what might have alerted their Digivices. After a while, Tai and Agumon noticed something on the ground, and saw a strange object that looked like crest with a question mark on it.

"Hey, come check this out." Tai said as he called everyone else, and they gathered around him.

"What is it?" Kari wondered.

"It looks like a crest." T.K. said.

"Is that a Crest? Like the ones we have?" Mimi questioned.

"Looks like it." Joe said. "But why is it here? I mean, I don't think theres any more Digidestined, right?"

Tai then reached down to pick it up to get a better look at it. As the group took a closer look at it, it suddenly began to glow brightly, and emitted a bright flash of light that engulfed them all.


Now, what will happen to them?
111.title: The whole group

After the flash of light faded Tai woke up feeling strange. He said, "Ow my head really hurts." He paused a moment, "Why is my voice different?" He started to panic as he looked down he wasn't wearing his usual clothes he saw a pink scarf, a tan short sleeve shirt, and pink shorts. He also had a whistle around his neck. He ran to a river nearby and saw the reflection of his little sister. Tai only had one reaction to this, "AWWWWWWWW! I'm Kari!!!!!!!" He began to hyperventilate, but eventually calmed down and ran to where his body was sleeping. He tried to wake it up, "Kari! Kari! Kari! Are you in my body?" His old body began to stir when it woke up.....
Who was in his body?

11131111.content:
Night had fallen over the digital world, the digidestined deciding to rest. Strangely, the location they decided on was by a large green crystal, which gave off a faint glow.
"Good night." Tai whispered, heading to sleep. The rest did the same, giving the crystal enough time to do it's work. When Tai woke up, he now had on ___ clothes...
11131111.title: Tai

111311111.content:
"Hey Tai, wake up." Agumon said. "The others are about ready for breakfast."

"Oh, thank you Agumon" Tai said as he got out of his sleeping bag. He was still a bit sleepy from last night. He had the strangest dream. He was back at the Gekomon Palace where he first encountered Mimi after he came back to the digital world to deal with Myotismon. Except the roles were reversed. Tai was dressed and acting exactly like Mimi complete with her princess gown while Mimi was dressed and acting exactly like Tai. There were also Joe and Gomamon who were dressed as bunnies. It was a weird dream.

As the sleepiness started to wore off Tai noticed that something was off about his clothes. He looked down and he noticed a familiar shade of pink on his clothes. "No! It couldn't be!" Tai said with shock. He ran over to the nearest pond to try to wake himself up. But when he got to the pond he got a good look at his reflection.

'Ahhhhh!" Tai screamed. He thought he was still dreaming for a moment there but he quickly realized that he was wrong. Tai was wearing a red western-styled dress with a buttoned turtleneck, a dark brown belt with a golden buckle, light brown gloves with brown straps around the wrists, pink socks and brown and white shoes. He also noticed that his hair was not in its usual style but it was loose and falling past his shoulders. Tai can confirm that he's dressed like Mimi. But why and how are his main questions. But before he can continue on.

"Tai!" Tai heard someone shout over the distance. He turned to the source of the sound which came from the bushes. Out of the bushes came Matt. "Tai are you alright?" Matt said with concern in his voice.

Now that Matt got a good look at Tai in his new clothes what was his reaction? Was he aware or unaware?

1113111212222211211321.content:
It was during the middle of the day on Earth, the eight digidestined: Tai, Matt, Sora, Mimi, Joe, Izzy, T.K. and Kari were playing a game of Truth or Dare in Tai and Kari's room. It's currently Kari's turn as she spun the bottle. The bottle slowly stopped moving until it was pointing to Matt. "Okay Matt, truth or dare." Kari said with a smile on her face.

"Dare." Matt said with a smug look on his face.

"Okay then, I dare you to wear my clothes." Kari said as she was looking at her dresser.

"What!" Matt said with a shocked look on his face.

Kari was now at her dresser looking to see which of her clothes she'll have Matt wear. She eventually decided to pick her usual outfit which consists of a yellow shirt with two white buttons in the top, pink pants, a pink scarf, white socks, red and white sneakers, and even some pink panties covered in hearts. "Okay Matt I got the clothes that I want you to wear. Come with me into the bathroom and I'll help you put them on." Kari said as she gave the clothes to Matt.

Matt, with his cheeks glowing red, took the bundle of clothes and went into the bathroom with Kari. He took off his normal clothes and began to put on Kari's clothes. He first put on the panties, then he put on the pink pants, the yellow shirt, the socks and sneakers, and finally Kari tied the pink scarf around his neck.

"Oops, I almost forgot." Kari said as she got out her whistle and put it around Matt's neck. "Oh Matt, you looked so cute." Kari said. Matt looked at himself in the mirror and couldn't help but feel utterly ridiculous being dressed in little girl clothes. But he realized that they fit surprisingly well on him. "Come on, the others have got to see you." Kari said as she took Matt's hand and led him out of the bathroom. Matt didn't want to let your friends see him like this but he knew that he'll only delay the inevitable.

So Matt and Kari exited the bathroom and you were in plain sight of the other digidestined. What happens next?
1113111212222211211321.title: Truth or Dare

11131112122222112113211.content:
After Matt and Kari left the bathroom the other digidestined took a long look at Matt in his new clothes.

"Oh my god, they actually fit you Matt!" Sora laughed.

"Prodigious. We must let this memory last forever." Izzy said as he took out a camera.

With great haste, everyone else grabbed their cameras and started to take photos of Matt. "Cut it out!" Matt shouted as he went over to Tai and tried to take his camera. Flashes came from behind him and Matt shot around. "Stop the pictures!"

"Why should we?" Sora asked.

"Because you're embarrassing me!" Matt yelled as his cheeks glowed red.

"Oh come on Matt, this is fun." Tai said.

"Hmm... If Kari's clothes fit him, I wonder if some of her dresses do." Mimi thought as she looked at Matt. "Hey Kari."

"Yeah." Kari said.

"Do you have any dresses that Matt could wear?" Mimi questioned.

"Yeah, I have lots of them." Kari said as she looked in her closet. "My mom loves to dress me up all girly whenever she has the opportunity. I have dresses in pink, yellow, white, and many other colors for weddings, parties, dances and even some casual ones for hanging around. But my mom's personal favorites are those frilly ones with poofy sleeves for the parties."

"Well Matt, want to model those dresses for us?" Mimi said.

Matt didn't even look at them directly. He just stared downward with an angered and embarrassed look on his face.

Sora went up to Matt. "We've got a lot of pictures of you with your new look Matt. If you don't want any to leak out, why not put on a show for us." Sora said with a smirk on her face.

What will Matt do?

On closer inspection, one could make out the mass amount of ruffles, ribbon and sequins that covered the garment. Heck, even the shoes were a similar story. "This could work."

Matt casually grabbed the hanger, taking the dress off and unzipped it.
"Let's get this over with." he thought and slipped his legs in. Next came his arms, which had to go through the puffed sleeves of the dress and now seemed to be to be covered in opera gloves that matched the dress. He made a quick glance down towards his legs, finding a similar set of stockings on his feet along with a pair of short pink high heels. A silver tiara rested in his hair, with even that smoothing out.
"I guess I should off my new look." Matt thought and exited the closet...

1113311211222211.content:
Tai shook his head. What just happened? The last thing he remembered was him and Kari sitting in front of Tai's computer, trying to find a way to go to the Digital World whenever they wanted.

Suddenly, the computer screen had started to glow, and an odd kind of stone had floated out of it. When he tried to pick it up to better look at it, it had engulfed both him, his room and Kari in a blinding light, causing him and his little sister to fall down.

As Tai sat up, he could feel that someone was gently shaking him, apparently to wake him up. That someone, was Kari, his little sister.

"Come on, Tai! Wake up! Wake up!" Tai heard Kari exclaiming frantically.

"What's wrong?" said Tai, still a bit disoriented.

"Something weird has happened, Tai!" insisted Kari. "See for yourself!"

Blinking the remaining stars out of his eyes, Tai looked over at his sister. Any hint of disorientation and fatigue disappeared at what he saw.

Kari was standing right by him, not surprising in itself. What was surprising was her current appearance. Somehow Kari was now dressed as Tai; a blue T-shirt with orange stars on the sleeves, a yellow pocket on each side of the chest, and three yellow buttons in the top, over a slightly longer yellow T-shirt with a turtleneck collar, brown cargo shorts, a black wristband on the left arm, white gloves, white socks, and blue and white sneakers with yellow triangles on them. All of it Tai's and all of it currently worn by Kari! But what was most shocking was her hair which is now styled and cut to look like Tai's.

On a hunch Tai ran over to the nearest mirror and looked at himself. Unfortunately, his hunch was right. Tai stared at the clothes he now wore; a yellow shirt with two white buttons in the top, a pink scarf around the neck, pink pants, white socks, red and white sneakers, and Kari's whistle. He was dressed exactly like Kari, but not just that, his hair was also cut and styled to look like Kari's.

"Waaahhh!!!" screamed Tai, gently tugging on Kari's pink pants, as he quickly got to his feet. "What's going on, Kari?! Why am I wearing all of your clothes?! This isn't some kind of prank, is it?!"

"No, Tai, it's not a prank!" defended Kari, lightly pulling on Tai's shirt. "And I don't know what happened! All I remember was that strange light coming from that stone. Next thing I know, I was laying on the floor and in your clothes!"

"Wait... the stone!" exclaimed Tai. "That stone must have swapped our clothes around, with that strange light! Hey, if the stone is what swapped our clothes around, then we could use it to switch them back!"

"I think you may be right, Tai," agreed Kari, her mood soaring. "Quick, lets find it!"

But, as they searched throughout the room for the stone and found that it had vanished, Kari's mood dropped again. She quickly turned to where some family pictures were hung up on their wall. A quick look indicated to her that something bigger is going on than just simply a swap of clothes.

"Um, Tai?" Kari called. Tai quickly turned to her.

"Yeah what is it Kari?" asked Tai. Kari quickly handed him a couple family pictures.

"I think that stone swapped more than just our clothes." said Kari as Tai looked through the pictures. One picture was on Tai's latest soccer match last month, but the weird thing was that in his place was Kari. Another picture was Kari's school picture that was taken a couple weeks ago, except with Tai in place of Kari, frilly pink party dress and all.

"What the...?" Tai was in shock at what was on those pictures. Does everyone think that Tai is now Kari and vice versa. Little did he know that he was completely right, the stone swapped Tai and Kari's lives. As in the stone screwed everyone's perception on Tai and Kari, leaving everyone to think that Kari is Tai and vice versa.

As the two siblings began to fully understand what just happened to them, they heard someone walking upstairs.

"Kari!" Tai and Kari could tell that was their mom, Yuuko, calling. She quickly opened the door to see the two swapped siblings.

"Kari. What are you doing? You need to get dressed for the party today." said Yuuko. With that, Tai and Kari remembered that she was supposed to go to her friend's birthday party today. Tai's cheeks quickly turned red as he knew that his mom believes that he's Kari and he has go to a little girl's birthday party today.

"Tai, I need to help your sister get ready. Just go downstairs and watch TV for a bit." said Yuuko as she gently led Kari out of the room. This left her helping Tai get ready for the birthday party today.

112122211.content:
Tai was the first wake up and he immediately felt that something was wrong. He had hair in his eyes, but that was strange his hair always stood up defying gravity. He felt something around his neck he touched his neck and pulled off a scarf a pink scarf. Tai panicked, "AH! WHY DO I HAVE KARI'S SCARF!" He realized he had his sister's voice and body.
Kari started to wake up she went rub what felt like bump on her head, but when she went to rub she felt Tai's goggles on her head. She looked around and saw her own body freaking out. She went over to her body that was currently freaking out.
She asked, "Tai is that you?" It was her brother's voice that asked the question. Her body nodded and began to cry, "I'm suppose to be the big brother not the little sister." Kari gave her now younger sister a hug to comfort her, "At least now I can take care of you for a change."

Suddenly Agumon in Gatomon's body started to wake up. He said, "Why do I feel so different? I feel softer and is there something on my tail?" His or rather Gatomon's eyes widened, "Why do I sound like Gatomon?" He looked at his body and saw he had Gatomon's body and panicked.

Gatomon began to wake up in Agumon's body and saw her own body panicking. She looked at herself and saw she had Agumon's body.

She growled, "Could things get any worse?"

After the siblings and both digimon partners calmed down they all decided to go back and meet up with the others and bring the rock with them.

Does anyone else swap when they get to camp?

Matt opened his eyes.
He had just taken a nice nap, ready to start the day.
"Why does everything look bigger?" he thought and made a quick glance down at his body, only to do a double take.
Gone was the blonde teenager, having been replaced with young girl with golden brown hair that went down to about her knees. She was currently dressed in a pink and white sailor with white socks and pink ballet flats. A pink bow sat in her long hair, which seemed to go well with her large blue eyes.
"Mina, are you up?" a voice shouted and Mina looked all around.

Matt shook his head. What just happened? The last thing he remembered was him and T.K. sitting in front of Matt's computer, trying to find a way to go to the Digital World whenever they wanted, because Patamon was feeling homesick.

Suddenly, the computer screen had started to glow, and an odd kind of stone had floated out of it. When he tried to pick it up to better look at it, it had engulfed both him, his room and T.K. in a blinding light, causing him and his little brother to fall down.

As Matt sat up, he could feel that someone was gently shaking him, appearently to wake him up. That someone, was T.K., his little brother.

"Come on, Matt! Wake up! Wake up!" Matt heard T.K. exclaiming frantically.

"What's wrong, T.K.?" said Matt, still a bit disoriented.

"Something weird has happened, Matt!" insisted T.K. "See for yourself!"

Blinking the remaining stars out of his eyes, Matt looked over at his brother. Any hint of disorientation and fatigue disappeared at what he saw.

T.K. was standing right beside him, itself not that surprising. What was surprising, was the clothes he was wearing. Somehow, T.K. was now wearing his clothes; a green vest over a light green shirt with long sleeves, khaki shorts, yellow socks, green and white strapped tennis shoes, a green backpack, and an odd green hat with a blue gem stone. All of it Matt's and all of it currently worn by T.K.!

On a hunch, Matt looked down at himself. Unfortunately, his hunch was right. Matt stared at the clothes he now wore; a sleeveless green shirt, brown gloves, blue jeans, dark brown shoes with gray soles and white socks. He was wearing all of T.K.'s clothes!

"Waaahhh!!!" screamed Matt, gently tugging on T.K.'s blue jeans, as he quickly got to his feet. "What's going on, T.K.?! Why am I wearing all of your clothes?! This isn't some kind of prank, is it?!"

"No, Matt, it's not a prank!" defended T.K., lightly pulling on Matt's vest. "And I don't know what happened! All I remember was that strange light coming from that stone. Next thing I know, I was laying on the floor and wearing all of your clothes!"

"Wait... the stone!" exclaimed Matt. "That stone must have swapped our clothes around, with that strange light! Hey, if the stone is what swapped our clothes around, then we could use it to switch them back!"

"I think you may be right, Matt," agreed T.K., his mood soaring. "Quick, lets find it!!!"

But, as they searched all of Matt's room for the stone and found that it had vanished, T.K.'s mood dropped again. He would feel a lot better, if he knew what had REALLY happened.

Matt had only been half right; the stone had swapped something, but it wasn't their clothes. The truth was, that both Matt and T.K. were wearing their usual clothes. However, the stone had swapped both of their perceptions on whose clothes belonged to whom, causing them to think that their normal clothes, really belonged to each other. (Not that either of them knew, of course.)

Sighing at not finding the stone, Matt by chance looked at himself in the mirror.

'Man, I look ridiculous wearing T.K.'s clothes,' thought Matt, as he switched between looking down at himself and looking at his reflection. Matt then noticed that T.K. had come over to also look in the mirror. He found it very disconcerting to see his little brother wearing his clothes, but not as disconcerting as he felt, wearing the clothes of his little brother.

Looking over himself again, Matt thought: 'I know I shouldn't be critical of what T.K. wears, that's his own choice. But still... they do feel uncomfortable. Like those gloves of his.' Matt raised his hands to look at T.K.'s gloves. 'I don't mind wearing gloves during the winter, but to wear them every day? No way I could do that!'

Looking downwards, Matt thought: 'Then there's his shirt.' He gently tugged on T.K.'s shirt to better look at it. 'I don't get the point of a sleeveless shirt. Why leave your arms bare? No, I'd rather have my long-sleeved shirt and my vest over this, any day.'

'It's the same deal with his jeans,' thought Matt, while also tugging on T.K.'s jeans, to better look at them. 'Why T.K. would want to completely cover his legs, I'll never know. There's so much fabric, that one can hardly move in them! There's also his shoes.' Matt looked at his feet, to look at T.K.'s shoes. 'They feel as stiff as a board; not at all like my soft tennis shoes. Plus, I feel so exposed without my hat.' Matt sighed again. 'T.K. sure has an odd fashion sense.'

Right next to Matt, T.K. was thinking close to the same thing. 'I know Matt is older than me, but that is no excuse for not choosing some comfortable clothes to wear. Like something other than this shirt and vest.' T.K. used one hand to tug at Matt's vest and the other hand to tug at a sleeve of Matt's shirt. 'I don't like wearing Matt's shirt; I prefer to have my arms bare. That's why I have a sleeveless shirt in the first place. And why does he wear a vest, when he's already got a shirt? I don't understand Matt sometimes.'

'I'm not sure about his shorts, either,' thought T.K., tugging on his brother's shorts. 'I can understand why he would wear them during summer, but he seems to wear them all of the time. That's why I wear jeans instead, I don't want to get cold. His shoes also feel weird.' T.K. leaned slightly forwards, so he could look at his feet, currently inside Matt's tennis shoes. 'They are so much softer, than I'm comfortable with. How can Matt even wear them? It feels like my feet are trapped in marshmallows! No, I'd rather be wearing my own shoes. They might be a little stiff, but they're nice to wear.'

'I can't say the same for this hat, though,' thought T.K., as he looked at Matt's hat in the mirror. 'Why would he want to cover his head like this? It's nice to feel the wind blowing through your hair, but Matt can't feel that if he wears this. Besides, it just looks silly.' T.K. looked at himself in the mirror again. 'Boy, do I look funny wearing Matt's clothes,' thought T.K. and tugged on the clothes again.

"Hey! Be careful, T.K.!" said Matt. "Those are my favorite clothes you are wearing, so please don't tug on them. I don't want them to tear or get wrinkled."

As he let go of Matt's clothes, T.K. saw that Matt was tugging on his own sleeveless shirt.

"Same thing to you, Matt!" he retorted.

"Oops! Sorry, T.K." apologized Matt and let go of T.K.'s shirt.

"Nah, it's okay, Matt," replied T.K.. "After all, I did it too."

The two brothers just looked at each other for a little while, both thinking about how weird the other one looked in their clothes. Then, in an attempt to lighten the mood, Matt said: "You know what, T.K.? This situation that we're in gives a whole new meaning to the phrase; 'walking a mile in each others shoes', don't it?"

"Yeah, it does," laughed T.K., finding it a bit funny. Swiching back to a normal tone, T.K. asked: "Hey, speaking of shoes, Matt, why are your tennis shoes so soft? It feels like I'm walking around with pillows on my feet."

"Well," answered Matt, "I just want my feet to feel comfortable, that's all. Although, I have to confess that that's difficult to do in your shoes, T.K.. These things feel as stiff as an icecube."

"Hey, I know my shoes aren't as soft as yours, Matt," said T.K.. "But like you said, I want my feet to feel comfortable, and I happen to like how my shoes feel."

"Come on, T.K., I didn't mean it like that," apologized Matt.

"I know you didn't, Matt," smiled T.K. "You know, I think it's a good thing that Patamon and Gabumon aren't here right now. They would probably laugh at us."

"Yeah, maybe," said Matt. He actually felt grateful that their Digimon were over at Tai's house, for their weekly Monopoly night. For some odd reason, Patamon was quite skilled at that game.

Looking at T.K. again, Matt asked him: "So, what do you think we should do now?"

Looking up at Matt, T.K. said surprised: "Why are you asking me? You should decide. After all, you are the oldest."

"True," said Matt. "But, since I was the one who touched that stone and got us into this mess, I figured that it was your turn to get us out of it."

"Oh, okay," said T.K.. "Hmmm... I'll have to think about that."

What does T.K. decide?
1133321212122222221211.title: Matt and T.K.'s odd clothing experience...

11333212121222222212111.content:
After about a minute of thinking, T.K. had come to a decision.

"Matt," he said. "As funny as we look, I would like to have my own clothes back. No offence, but your clothes are starting to feel rather itchy."

"No offence taken, T.K.," replied Matt. "I was actually feeling the same thing about your clothes."

"Well then, what are we waiting for?" said T.K., taking off Matt's hat and blue backpack. (Sorry, I got the colour wrong last chapter.)

"Good point, T.K.," said Matt, as he removed T.K.'s gloves from his hands.

"Hey, Matt," said T.K., as he took off Matt's vest and shirt. "Why is it that you wear both a shirt and a vest? Doesn't it get too warm wearing all that?"

"No, not really," said Matt, while taking off T.K.'s sleeveless shirt. "I guess that I just like wearing both things."

"Oh, okay, Matt," said T.K., as both brothers took off what they thought to be each others socks and shoes.

"But one thing that I really DON'T like wearing, is your jeans, T.K.," said Matt, removing said jeans from his legs. "There's far too much fabric for my tastes."

"I feel the same about your shorts, Matt," said T.K., as he took off Matt's shorts. "Exept in my case, it's because there isn't enough fabric."

"Well, that's not going to be an issue now," said Matt, as he turned to look at T.K.. "Not since we..." He trailed off, as he saw that it wasn't just their outer clothes that had been swapped. When T.K. noticed it, it took him all of his willpower, not to start crying.

"Matt," said T.K. meekly. "A-am I wearing y-your..."

"I'm afraid so, T.K.," admitted Matt grugdingly. "And I'm wearing yours. It looks like that stone was very thorough when it swapped our clothes."

"No kidding," said T.K.. "It even swapped our underwear!"

Indeed! Due to the stone swapping their perceptions on clothes, the two brothers now thought they were wearing each others underwear too. In their minds, T.K. was wearing Matt's white briefs with a green band and Matt was wearing T.K.'s grey briefs with a white band, even though those briefs was really their own.

Blushing as red as a tomato, T.K. hurridly slid Matt's briefs down and off his legs. "I know I've said that I can't wait until I'm tall enough for the big-boy pants," said T.K. shakily, "but I didn't mean that I wanted to wear your underwear too, Matt!"

"I know, T.K.," said Matt, just as red in the face, as he took off T.K.'s briefs. "It was that crazy stone that did this, not you. I didn't want to wear your underwear either, T.K.; I outgrew your size years ago!"

"Yeah, and I'm not yet big enough for your size," said T.K., neither of the brothers aware that the underwear was actually theirs and therefore the right size all along.

Handing the briefs and all of the other clothes over to each other, Matt and T.K. felt much relief.

"Well, now that we have our own clothes back, that's no longer ann issue," said Matt.

"You said it," agreed T.K..

The two of them then started to put on what they thought were their clothes, backs to each other and at each end of Matt's room, to avoid things getting awkward.

Whose P.O.V. should we follow now?
11333212121222222212111.title: He wants to swap their clothes back to 'normal'...

choices: It' getting late, so they decide to go to sleep.

After about a minute of thinking, T.K. had come to a decision.

"Matt," he said. "As funny as we look, I would like to have my own clothes back. No offence, but your clothes are starting to feel rather itchy."

"Good point, T.K.," said Matt, as he removed T.K.'s gloves from his hands.

"Hey, Matt," said T.K., as he took off Matt's vest and shirt. "Why is it that you wear both a shirt and a vest? Doesn't it get too warm wearing all that?"

"No, not really," said Matt, while taking off T.K.'s sleeveless shirt. "I guess that I just like wearing both things."

"Oh, okay, Matt," said T.K., as both brothers took off what they thought to be each others socks and shoes.

"But one thing that I really DON'T like wearing, is your jeans, T.K.," said Matt, removing said jeans from his legs. "There's far too much fabric for my tastes."

"I feel the same about your shorts, Matt," said T.K., as he took off Matt's shorts. "Exept in my case, it's because there isn't enough fabric."

"Well, that's not going to be an issue now," said Matt, as he turned to look at T.K.. "Not since we..." He trailed off, as he saw that it wasn't just their outer clothes that had been swapped. When T.K. noticed it, it took him all of his willpower, not to start crying.

"Matt," said T.K. meekly. "A-am I wearing y-your..."

"I'm afraid so, T.K.," admitted Matt grugdingly. "And I'm wearing yours. It looks like that stone was very thorough when it swapped our clothes."

"No kidding," said T.K.. "It even swapped our underwear!"

Indeed! Due to the stone swapping their perceptions on clothes, the two brothers now thought they were wearing each others underwear too. In their minds, T.K. was wearing Matt's white briefs with a green band and Matt was wearing T.K.'s grey briefs with a white band, even though those briefs was really their own.

Blushing as red as a tomato, T.K. hurridly slid Matt's briefs down and off his legs. "I know I've said that I can't wait until I'm tall enough for the big-boy pants," said T.K. shakily, "but I didn't mean that I wanted to wear your underwear too, Matt!"

"I know, T.K.," said Matt, just as red in the face, as he took off T.K.'s briefs. "It was that crazy stone that did this, not you. I didn't want to wear your underwear either, T.K.; I outgrew your size years ago!"

"Yeah, and I'm not yet big enough for your size," said T.K., neither of the brothers aware that the underwear was actually theirs and therefore the right size all along.

Handing the briefs and all of the other clothes over to each other, Matt and T.K. felt much relief.

"Well, now that we have our own clothes back, that's no longer ann issue," said Matt.

"You said it," agreed T.K..

The two of them then started to put on what they thought were their clothes, backs to each other and on each side of Matt's room, to avoid things getting awkward.

'I still can't believe that the stone even gave me T.K.'s underwear; it felt weird to wear underwear way too small for me,' thought Matt, as he put his feet through the appropriate holes in his briefs. Sliding them up his legs, Matt thought: 'It's a good thing that I got these back. They are just my size,' Having gotten the briefs fully on by now, Matt turned to look at himself in the mirror. 'Now, that's much better,' he thought. 'It would have been awkward if I had worn T.K.'s briefs, instead of my own.'

Actually, Matt really WAS wearing T.K.'s briefs now! Being too small for him, the briefs were a little constricting on his crotch and didn't completely cover neither his 'tender parts', nor his buttocks. But, because of his swapped perception, Matt didn't notice any of this, as he thought that the briefs were really his own.

Matt then focused on the shorts. Somehow, he got his legs through them, without ripping them, and though they were only the size of boxers on his large frame, and also quite tight on him, Matt was still pleased to wear them.

Next up for Matt, was the shirt and vest. Again, he just barely managed to put the too-small clothes on, without causing them to tear. Being undersized on him, the sleeves of the shirt only made it down to his elbows and both the shirt and the vest didn't completely cover his torso, both stopping at about midways on his belly.

Then, it was time for the footwear. While Matt had no trouble putting them on, the socks only came up to just above his ankles because of their small size. The same thing could not be said about the shoes. Matt had quite a bit of difficulty getting his feet into a pair of tennis shoes, that was a few sizes too small for him. When he finally did manage to get them on, he didn't notice that the shoes were somewhat constricting on his feet, because he thought the shoes were his own.

Finally, there was only the hat and the backpack left. Putting on the hat first, Matt didn't realize that it was really too small for him, causing it to simply balance loosely on the top of his head. Lastly; because of his long arms, getting them through the straps of the backpack was somewhat of a chore, but he managed to do it.

'Finally, I'm back in my own clothes, again,' thought Matt, as he looked at himself in the mirror. 'Man, it felt so weird to wear T.K.'s clothes. It's a good thing that crazy stone only swapped our clothes; who knows what other strange things could have happened.' Turning towards T.K.'s side of the room, Matt added: 'I wonder how far T.K. has made it.'

At the same time Matt was putting on what he thought were his clothes, T.K. was doing the same thing.

'I 'd never have guessed that the stone would even swap my underwear with Matt's,' thought T.K., as he put on what he thought was his own briefs. 'I'm really glad that I got my own briefs back. It'll be a couple more years before I'm old enough to wear that size,' he added, unaware that he was actually wearing Matt's briefs. But, because of their size, he had to hold them up, so they wouldn't slide off of him.

T.K. then turned his attention to the jeans. Being much too large for him to wear normally, T.K. had to roll up the jeans-legs a great deal, before he could get them on his comparatively tiny legs. Again, he also had to hold up the jeans with his hands, to stop them from falling off of him.

Next, T.K. put on the sleeveless shirt. Since the shirt was really Matt's, (not that either of them realized that, due to the stone), it was very oversized on T.K.'s small body. It was so oversized, that the bottom edge of the shirt went all the way down to his knees. Of course, since T.K. had to use both hands to put on the shirt, both the jeans and the briefs he was wearing fell down around his ankles, causing T.K. to blush in embarrasment and quickly pull them back up.

Then, T.K. put on what he thought to be his footwear, sitting down to prevent 'his' briefs and jeans from falling down again. Matt's socks were so big on him, that they almost covered his legs completely. But that was nothing, compared to the shoes. T.K.'s small feet were practically swimming in Matt's big shoes; they were that loose on him! Everytime he took a step, his feet would slosh around inside the shoes, making it hard for him to walk like he usually did.

All that was left now, was the gloves. As T.K. put them on, still sitting down, he didn't realize the fact that they were really too big for him, the gloves being very loose on his hands and his fingers not filling out the fingers in the gloves.

Thinking he was now dressed like he normally was, T.K. stood back up, both of his hands still holding up the briefs and jeans.

'Much better!' he thought, as he looked at himself in the mirror on his side of the room. 'It so nice to be clad in my own clothes again. It felt so wierd wearing all of Matt's clothes; they didn't fit me at all.' Turning towards Matt's side of the room, T.K. added: 'I wonder how far Matt has gotten.'

Both brothers looked at each other, at the exact same time and smiled.

"Hey! You look like yourself again, Matt!" exclaimed T.K.

"And so do you, T.K.," said Matt.

Of course, they only thought that because of the stone. Anyone not affected by it, would have seen things as they really were: Matt being squeezed into the, to him, too small clothes of his 7-year old little brother, and T.K. nearly swimming in the, to him, too big clothes of his 10-year old big brother.

As the two of them stood there, happy that they were wearing their own clothes again, the telephone suddenly rang.

"I'll get it!" called T.K., as he hurried into the living room as fast as he could, which wasn't that fast. Because he was wearing Matt's clothes, T.K. had to walk relatively slow, so that his feet wouldn't swim around too much in the shoes.

When he made it into the living room, T.K. had to move over a chair he could stand on, so he could reach the phone. Moving the chair and crawling onto it while making sure his briefs and jeans didn't fall down, was quite a chore for T.K., but he did it. T.K. then answered the phone.

As he put down the phone, Matt came in.

"Who was it?" he asked.

"That was Gabumon," answered T.K.. "He and Patamon have decided to sleep over at Tai's place for the night."

"Fine with me," said Matt. "But what should we do in the meantime?"

"Well..."

When Agumon turns around, he sees a strange digi-egg. The digi-egg is pink with the arrow symbol for female on it, and the egg itself has a slight heart shape to it. Agumon walks over to it for a closer look, picking it up in his claws. "What is this...?"

After searching around for it, they realized it was nowhere to be found. So they started to make their way back to camp, not realizing they had started to walk in a more feminine manner. After a bit of walking, the pair started to feel strange, as if something was wrong. "Do you feel, different Agumon?" Tai asked. "Now that you mention it, I do feel kind of weird. In a part of the Digital World, currently lying on the ground was a small, mysterious object. It looked to be a a large egg. 12.title: Season 2/Adventure 02

121.content:
It was a peaceful day in the Digital World, and the Digidestined, Davis, Yolei, Cody, T.K., Kari, Ken, and their Digimon partners were currently on patrol today, on the look out for any trouble. As they did, they all suddenly heard a beeping noise coming from their D-3s.

"Woah, whats going on?" Davis questioned as he and the others all reached for their D-3s to see why they were suddenly acting like they were.

"I don't know." Yolei replied.

As they all checked their D-3s, they saw some flashing lights on their screen that represented them, and another one that appeared to be a distance away from them. "It looks like their showing us something is nearby." Ken said.

"But the question is, what?" T.K. said.

"Should we check it out?" Cody asked.

"If our Digivices are telling us where something is, that probably means of course we should check it out." Davis said.

"Or maybe its telling us we should avoid it." T.K. said.

"Maybe we should check it out." Kari said. "Whether its dangerous or not, right now we have no way of knowing what the case is here."

"And you don't have to worry about anything with us here." Veemon said.

"So then its decided." Davis said. And with that, they all made their way to the location that was being shown to them by their D-3s. When they did, they found themselves in a clearing, and in the center, they saw a strange Digi-Egg in the center of .

"A Digi-Egg?" Gatomon said.

"But I thought all your old crests were accounted for." Yolei said.

"And yet, here it is." Hawkmon said.

"But what is it doing here?" Patamon said.

Walking over to it, they look it over. It was black and white, with a symbol that looked like a question mark in the center of it.

"Should we take it?" Cody asked.

"I don't know." T.K. said. "I'm not sure why, but I've got a bad feeling about this."

"Well, I say we should." Davis said. "I mean, it wouldn't be the first Digi-Egg we found that wasn't for one of your old crests."

"Well, I guess we could try and take it, and have Izzy take a look at it." Kari said.

"That does sound like a good idea." Cody said. "And I guess we shouldn't just leave it here."

"I guess that settles it." Yolei said. "So, who wants to do the honors?"

"I guess I'll try first." Davis said as he then reached down to pick it up, and lifted it up without any trouble. "See? Nothing to it." he said as he held it out for everyone to see as they all gathered around it. As the group took a closer look at it, it suddenly began to glow brightly, and emitted a bright flash of light that engulfed them all.


Now, what will happen to them?

121332212212.content:
With the flash subsiding, the group of humans and digimon alike blinked slowly to regain their vision. Once clear, the group quickly descended into a flurry of, "What was that's" and "I don't know" or "Are you okay?" Thankfully everyone was okay. With a group sigh, the group was relieved for they knew how dangerous the Digital world could be and having apparently escaped the effects of the light was a real blessing.

Wanting to find out any possible information, Ken pulled out his digivice in hopes of finding some sort of clue as to what the egg was. To his luck, the digivice still had a lock on the strange energy.

Davis then noticed Ken's thinking face and walked over to him. "You got something Ken?"

"Yes Davis, I do," answered Ken as he began to do some calculations. "It seems whatever we did might have awoken the egg. It's currently heading farther into the continent at a pretty respectable pace, I'd say at least 60 to 70 miles per hour. If we hurry now, we might be able to keep it in range of our digivices."

"Normally, I'd say we leave the egg alone," began T.K who brought everyone else's attention to the discussion, "but I think our we definitely need to try and follow it if we can. We have no idea what that egg did to us. By finding the egg and bringing it to Izzy, we might find out what it is."

"Plus," added Yolei, "It might be a source of super digital power. Who knows what might happen if it got into the wrong hands."

Cody nodded at the prospect. "We should definitely search it out."

"Alright," shouted Davis, "Then I guess we have a course of action. Let's follow that egg! Yolei, Digivolve Hawkmon so we can follow the egg."

"I would believe that would normally be the perfect idea Davis," hopped in Hawkmon, "But, unfortunately the canopy over the heads is took think for me to grow. Not to mention that due to my lack of energy, I wouldn't be able to digivolve anyway."

As if to accentuate his point a collective growl from everyone's stomach, signaled that it was time to have some lunch. "Well, I guess we can't exactly follow the egg on an empty stomach. Veemon? How far away is the nearest food grove, you know apples and such?" The little blue digimon thought for probably a few seconds before snapping his fingers and pointing towards a rocky ridge that was quite far away. "Just over that ridge. It's a pretty nice place, I've eaten in that grove a few times."

"Sooner we get there, the sooner we can find out what that egg is all about, let's go team," rallied Davis as he started running. The rest of the group followed shortly after, though thankfully Davis slowed down to allow everyone to travel in a group.

As the group continued through the thick forest and tightly woven canopy, a few of the party noticed small issues. Davis, for instance, quite finding his tongue with his pointed tooth. The thing is he swore they had gotten sharper, but this was just a fleeting thought as he had to focus on where he stepped in the mangled mess of tree roots and ancient vines. Yolei began to scratch occasionally, nothing too bothersome just the occasional odd itch. The rest of the Digidestined suffered other minor things hardly worth noting, except for Kari. As the brown-haired girl walked along, she found she was having considerable trouble. Sure the ground was a literal knot of roots, plants, and old tree limbs, but for some reason, Kari felt as if she was having more trouble than she should. Her shoes seemed to be the major source of the problem. For some reason, Kari's shoes actually felt too big for her feet, causing her feet to shift about in the shoe whenever she felt she had a good foot hold.

Gatomon soon noticed Kari's troubles. "Kari, is something wrong?"

"No," said Kari trying to play off her difficulties. "I've got thiii~!" That is all Kari was able to say before her right foot slipped into a wooden crevice. Looking to where her foot was caught, Kari found she was rather stuck. Yank as she did, all Kari managed to do was frustrate herself even more. Finally, not wanting to slow down the group anymore, Kari reached down, pulled off her pink and white shoe, and breathed a sigh of relief. Never had Kari felt a pleasure like she did now. For some unexplainable reason, Kari felt so pleased to be free of her shoe. Wiggling her toes as if on instinct, Kari was in such a mix of pleasure and relief that she did not notice the lack of two toes. With already one shoe off and her friends calling to her in the distance, Kari wasted no time and tore off her other shoe, feeling that same level of pleasure. Setting her white socked feet to the ground. Kari quickly not only rejoined her friends, but raced passed them. Now with her feet free, Kari was able to find more secure foot placements and with little effort, lead the team through the forest to the base of the ridgeline.

"Wow Kari," spoke Gatomon as she rejoined her friend, the team still a few yards off, "When did you get moves like that?"

"I don't really know," answered the tamer, "Once I took off my shoes, it came pretty naturally to me."

"After living with you humans for so long, I still have no clue why you people bother with such confining things," said the cat as she took a position similar to Kari as they waited for the team to catch up.

"You know Gatomon," said Kari as she looked at her shoes and remembering the pleasure she had felt earlier, "I'm right there with you. I'm surprised I never tried this sooner." Kari then tossed her shoes to the ground and waited for the others.

12222.content:
It was a nice and sunny day in the digital world. With the fall of MaloMyotismon, peace had finally came to both worlds.
At the moment, Davis and Veemon were hiking a trail.
"Davis, I'm hungry!" Veemon announced and Davis groaned. Somethings never did change, which the digidestined was fine with. The two then sat down on some rocks to the left. Unbeknownst to the two, the rocks they were sitting on had magical powers, for some reason...
12222.title: The mysterious stone

122221.content:
After sitting down, Davis pulled out some sandwiches, not noticing the disappearance of his body hair. He handed one to Veemon and then began to chow on the other. As that happened, the width of his arms decreased and his hips widened. As he continued to chew on his lunch, his jacket sleeves shortened, allowing his yellow gloves to stretch up his arms and go from rubber to cloth. What remained of his jacket, fused into some sort of corset. The top began to squeeze the boy's chest until he appeared to have two massive melons on his chest. His socks stretched up his legs, acting as leggings. This was then followed by his sneakers reforming into a pair of red high heels with a two inch heel. "Davis's" shorts then fused together and lengthened down to his feet, turning red in the process. His features softened as pink lipstick smothered his lips. His eyes grew bigger and his hair smoothed out, trailing down to the bottom of his dress. His goggles then shattered, reforming into a silver tiara with a golden "V" in the middle. Finally, her D-3 reformed into a dark blue oval brooch, right between her breasts.
"Davis, are you alright?" Veemon asked and "Davis" laughed.
"It's Queen Deanna, my daughter." Deanna explained, the symbol of miracles now visible in her brooch. At that same moment, Veemon glowed with dark blue energy...
122221.title: Queen Deanna

1222211.content: "Deanna, what are you doing to me?" Veemon accused as his mother lifted him up into the air. The digimon could only watch as his body stretched, eventually becoming about six inches shorter than Deanna. His hips widened and his arms got thinner. A set of melons formed on his chest and a smaller version of Deanna's dress materialized upon him. This was followed by the leggings and heels, along with the hair and lipstick. Like Deanna, a dark blue oval was placed in between her breasts...
1222211.title: Princess Velia

choices: The Digidestined go looking for Davis and Veemon

"Velia, are you ready to go?" Deanna inquired and Velia nodded. The two got up from the rocks, continuing up the trail. Climbing up was a bit harder than before, but the queen and her daughter managed. At the top, was a large open space with a large stone that looked like a flattened cylinder. The two approached, quite happy for themselves. "Ready to do this?"
"Yes, mother." Velia answered and placed her left hand down on the stone. Deanna did the same, causing a bright light to engulf the area. When the light cleared, a castle had materialized for them to rule from...

12232222212.title: Maybe they think they are dressed as each other?

choices: They continue to walk around the Digital World, dressed like this.
They go back to the human World, dressed like this.
122322222121.content:
It was a lovely day in the Digital World. Davis had decided to go on a solo trip, to hang out with Veemon, without the others being there, for a change. They were currently walking through the forest, when Davis saw something on the ground.

'Huh, what's that?' he said as he picked it up.

It turned out to be a very strange stone of some kind. It was shaped like a five-pronged star and unusually shiny in colour.

'What'cha' got there, Davis?' asked Veemon.

'I'm not quite sure, Veemon. It looks like an odd kind of rock, to me,' said Davis.

'Can I see it?' asked Veemon

'Sure. Here you go, pal,' said Davis and held out the stone so Veemon could take it. But, as soon as Veemon touched the stone in Davis' hand, the stone started to glow very brightly, as though an entire lighthouse was inside of it. Davis and Veemon both had to cover thier eyes, and for a few moments, they couldn't see anything. As the light slowly faded back into the stone, nothing appeared to be out of the ordinary. However, the rock had indeed caused something to change...

Davis and Veemon were blinking hard to shake off the effects of the bright light. As they recovered, they voiced their opinions on the odd behavior of the rock.

'What just happened, Veemon?' said Davis, as his eyesight slowly returned.

'I don't know, Davis,' said Veemon and looked up at his partner. 'But that was one wierd light, don't you...' He trailed off and stared at his partner, who still couldn't see fully, yet. Then Veemon looked down at himself and stared even more. He then stared from Davis, to himself and back again a few more times. He then blushed in embarrasment and nervously tried to cover himself with his hands.

'Actually... I think I did know what happened,' said Veemon meekly.

'Really? What was it, then?,' said Davis, who had finally gotten his complete eyesight back, but currently wasn't looking at Veemon.

'Erm... Take a look at what you are wearing,' was the answer from Veemon.

Davis looked down at himself. He was wearing his normal Digi-World outfit; the blue jacket with flame patterns, brown shorts and shoes, gloves and goggles. However, as he was looking at it, something clicked inside his mind and he began to think that the clothes he was wearing, actually belonged to Veemon!

(These wierd thoughts, that the two of them were having, was due to the effects of the strange rock they found, but they didn't realize anything was wrong with how they thought; they just thought it was normal.)

Naturally, he began to flip.

'Aaaaaahhhhhhh!!!!!' Davis screamed, also blushing in embarrasment, as he pulled on his jacket a little, to better look at it. 'V-Veemon! W-Why am I suddenly wearing your clothes?!?'

'I think it was maybe because of that stupid rock,' said Veemon, as he fidgeted nervously, still trying to cover himself with his hands. 'When we both touched it at the same time, it must have made us swap outfits. But because you don't normally wear anything, I've ended up naked!'

Davis looked over at his partner and couldn't hold back a laugh.

'Man, Veemon. You look so silly without your clothes on!'

'Well, you look silly, WITH clothes on!' was Veemon's response. 'Anyway, we shouldn't stay out here in plain sight for long; not while looking like this.'

Veemon looked around the area, searching for something specific.

'Over there,' said Veemon and pointed at some bushes. 'We can change our outfits back, behind those bushes. And the sooner, the better,' he added. 'I feel so uncomfortable being in the nude. I don't understand how you how you can go like that all the time, Davis.'

'Tell me about it,' sighed Davis, looking distinctly uncomfortable wearing his own clothes, (though he did not percieve them to be his clothes anymore), as they walked behind the bushes. 'I don't get how you can even wear these things, Veemon. They just feel so..... stuffy and constricting. I don't feel well, at all, in this,' he added, as he touched the clothes, that (in his mind) belonged to his best friend. Truthfully, he did find the (to him) alien sensation of having clothes on, to be a little bit facinating, but not so much so, that he would like to have them on for too long.

'Hey, speak for yourself,' said Veemon. 'I don't know how I would make it through the day without my clothes on. Speaking of which, would you mind taking my clothes off of you, and give them back to me, now?'

'Be glad to, Veemon,' said Davis, and blushed. 'But, err... how do I do that?'

Veemon mentally slapped himself in the face. Of course, I forgot, he thought. Since Davis doesn't wear clothes, he doesn't know how to put them on, or take them off.

'Here, let me help you,' he said out loud, as he walked over to Davis, to do just that. 'First, we're gonna' have to get my shoes and socks off of your feet, so I need you to sit down, Davis. That will make it easier.'

'Ten-four, buddy,' said Davis and sat down on the forest floor. Veemon then went over to Davis and began to undo the straps on the shoes. When that was done, Veemon pulled the shoes off of his best friend's feet. The socks quickly followed suit.

Davis breathed a sigh of relief. His feet had felt so trapped inside those shoes, so he was glad to feel the grass under his bare feet again.

'Now, Davis,' said Veemon. 'Before I can get those other clothes off of you, you'll have to take off my goggles and gloves, first.'

'Okay, pal,' said Davis and began to remove the items. But he did so slowly and clumsily, as though he hadn't done it before, (which, in his mind, he hadn't). After taking off the gloves and goggles, he looked at Veemon and asked: 'Alright, buddy. What's next?'

'Next thing to remove, is the jacket and the shirt,' answered Veemon. 'You need to stand up for this, though,' he added.

'That's fine,' said Davis, as he stood back up again. 'You're the expert, Veemon.'

'That's right!' proclaimed Veemon proudly, as he jumped up on a large stone behind Davis, so he could reach him better. 'I need you to stand with your back to me and then lean your arms towards me, so I can take it off,' said Veemon. Davis did as instructed. Veemon then took a firm grip on the jacket and slid it right off of Davis' body. 'Now I need you to face me, lean your torso towards me and put your arms over your head,' said Veemon. Again, Davis did as instructed. Veemon grasped the shirt and slowly pulled it up over Davis' head, his arms, and then fully off.

With his torso now bare, Davis once more felt relief. Those clothes had felt so restricting to him; he was glad to have them off. Then he realized that there was still one thing remaining, and so did Veemon, both blushing bright crimson at the thought.

Realizing how awkward it would be otherwise, Veemon carefully told Davis precisely how to remove the last piece of clothing on him... The shorts. As Davis was fumbling with the button on the shorts, blushing all the while, he and Veemon made a silent agreement to not tell the other Digidestined about this; they would never hear the end of it! Davis finally unclipped the button and took off the shorts. However, there were still one last thing remaining...

'I don't believe this!' exclaimed Davis. 'That stupid rock even gave me your underwear, Veemon!'

Blushing so much that his head looked like a tomato, Veemon said: 'Those boxers are easy to remove, though. Just slide them down over your legs and they will come right off, Davis.'

Davis did as Veemon told him and as the final constricting piece of fabric was removed from his body, Davis felt the greatest wave of relief yet. Now that he was finally free of those uncomfortable garments, he felt he could breathe again. And, of course, Veemon had gotten his clothes back, and not a moment too soon. He found it really awkward to watch his partner stroll around in the nude.

Veemon picked up all of the discarded clothes and said: 'I'm gonna go back there and put these on. I'll be right back!'

'Okay, buddy,' said Davis, as he watched Veemon retreat behind a bush. The fact that the clothes were made for use by humans, therefore being much too large for Veemon to properly use, was appearently lost on both of them, thanks to the magical rock they had found.

As soon as Veemon was behind the bush, he immediately began to put on the clothes, starting with the boxers. Though really being too large for him, looing more like shorts on him, he just used his tail as a kind of wegde, to prevent them from falling down, while still allowing him to walk. Then, he put on the shirt. It was so big, it covered his whole body, including his feet, but he took no notice. Next, he put on the shorts, though they were more like a proper pair of pants on his small body, wedging his tail like he did with the boxers, to stop them from coming off. Then he put on 'his' jacket, though he had to roll the sleeves up, to get his tiny arms through them. Then he put on the sock and shoes; somehow maneging to not rip the socks with his claws, the claws also preventing the far too big shoes from slipping off.

Finally, he put the goggles on his head and Veemon was now fully dressed in what he thought to be his clothes. Despite the clothes being almost monstrously oversized on his body, he felt so much more comfortable now, as compared to when he wasn't wearing anything at all.

'Ah, that feels so much better,' said Veemon to himself. 'It's really nice to have my good, old clothes back on. When we get back, though, I'd better tell Izzy about that crazy rock. Maybe he can find a way to stop it from making more mischief.'

As he walked back around the bush, adjusting 'his' goggles in the meantime, he looked up at his now naked partner and asked: 'So, Davis. Where should we go now?'

Davis thought about it...

122322222211.content:
There is now two options, as to how they will swap:



Option 1: They swap only partially, meaning they still realize they are themselves, but they will get each others personality traits. (So, for example, instead of Davis having a crush on Kari, it will now be Veemon who has it, instead.)



Option 2: They completely swap their whole personalities, but nothing else, meaning that although they still have their normal bodies, they now believe they are each other. (So Davis now believes he is really Veemon and Veemon now believes he is really Davis.) However, they still have their regular bodies, but they THINK they have the body corresponding to their new personalities, meaning that even though Veemon has his normal body, he thinks that he is really Davis and so he thinks he has Davis' human body, and so thinks he is taller that he really is, and vice versa for Davis. It also means, that they think they still have their usual skills, but because their bodies haven't changed, they don't have them in reality. (Ergo, since Veemon believes he is really Davis, he also believes that he is the one to carry Davis' D3 and D-Terminal, both needed for Veemon to Digivolve. But because HE is Veemon, just with a different personality, they won't work for him; they only function in Davis' hands, but because Davis now thinks he is really Veemon... well, you get the point.) Also, it is still Veemon's body that is able to use Digimon attacks and Digivolve, not Davis' body; but because Davis thinks he is really Veemon, he thinks that he has those attacks/skills, and because Veemon thinks he is really Davis, he doesn't realize that it is still him, who is the Digimon, and so him that has those abillities.


So, what's your choice?
122322222211.title: How much will they swap their personalities?

1223222222112.content: Will the swap happen instantly, or gradually?

Now that he was finally free of those uncomfortable garments, he felt he could breathe again. And, of course, Veemon had gotten 'his' clothes back, and not a moment too soon. He found it really awkward to watch his partner stroll around in the nude.

Veemon picked up all of the discarded clothes and said: "I'm gonna go back there and put these on. I'll be right back!"

"Okay, buddy," said Davis, as he watched Veemon retreat behind a bush. The fact that the clothes were made for use by humans, therefore being much too large for Veemon to properly use, was appearently lost on both of them, thanks to the magical rock they had found.

As soon as Veemon was behind the bush, he immediately began to put on the clothes, starting with the boxers. Though really being too large for him, looking more like shorts on him, he just used his tail as a kind of wegde, to prevent them from falling down, while still allowing him to walk. Then, he put on the shirt. It was so big, it covered his whole body, including his feet, but he took no notice. Next, he put on the shorts, though they were more like a proper pair of pants on his small body, wedging his tail like he did with the boxers, to stop them from coming off. Then he put on 'his' jacket, though he had to roll the sleeves up, to get his tiny arms through them. Then he put on the socks and shoes; somehow managing to not rip the socks or shoes with his claws, the claws also preventing the far too big shoes from slipping off. The gloves was what he put on next. Because Veemon's hands were much like a humans, he could put them on without problems.

Finally, he put the goggles on his head and Veemon was now fully dressed in what he thought to be his clothes. Despite the clothes being almost monstrously oversized on his body, he felt so much more comfortable now, as compared to when he wasn't wearing anything at all.

"Ah, that feels so much better," said Veemon to himself. "It's really nice to have my good, old clothes back on. When we get back, though, I'd better tell Izzy about that crazy rock. Maybe he can find a way to stop it from making more mischief." He checked 'his' pocket, confirming 'his' Digivice and D-3 was still there.

As he walked back around the bush, adjusting 'his' goggles in the meantime, he looked up at his now naked partner and asked: "So, Davis. Where should we go now?"

Davis thought about it...
12232222221122.title: The start of becoming like each other mentally...

choices: They go back to the Human World, as they currently are.
They continue to walk around the Digital World, as they currently are.
122322222211222.content:
It was a lovely day in the Digital World. Davis had decided to go on a solo trip, to hang out with Veemon, without the others being there, for a change. They were currently walking through the forest, when Davis saw something on the ground.

"Huh, what's that?" he said as he picked it up.

It turned out to be a very strange stone of some kind. It was shaped like a five-pronged star and unusually shiny in colour.

"What'cha' got there, Davis?" asked Veemon.

"I'm not quite sure, Veemon. It looks like an odd kind of rock, to me," said Davis.

"Can I see it?" asked Veemon.

"Sure. Here you go, pal," said Davis and held out the stone so Veemon could take it. But, as soon as Veemon touched the stone in Davis' hand, the stone started to glow very brightly. Davis and Veemon both had to cover thier eyes, and for a few moments, they couldn't see anything. As the light slowly faded back into the stone, nothing appeared to be out of the ordinary. However, the rock had indeed caused something to change...

Davis and Veemon were blinking hard to shake off the effects of the bright light. As they recovered, they voiced their opinions on the odd behavior of the rock.

"What just happened, Veemon?" said Davis, as his eyesight slowly returned.

"I don't know, Davis," said Veemon and looked up at his partner. "But that was one wierd light, don't you..." He trailed off and stared at his partner, who still couldn't see fully, yet. Then Veemon looked down at himself and stared even more. He then stared from Davis, to himself and back again a few more times. He then blushed in embarrasment and nervously tried to cover himself with his hands.

"Actually... I think I did know what happened," said Veemon meekly.

"Really? What was it, then?," said Davis, who had finally gotten his eyesight back, but wasn't looking at Veemon.

"Erm... Take a look at what you are wearing," was the answer from Veemon.

Davis looked down at himself. He was wearing his normal Digi-World outfit; the dark blue jacket with a red and yellow flame pattern at the bottom over a light green shirt, dark olive green shorts, dark blue socks, orange and white boots, yellow gloves and silver goggles. However, as he was looking at it, something clicked inside his mind and he began to think that the clothes he was wearing, actually belonged to Veemon!

The wierd thoughts that the two of them were having, was due to the effects of the strange rock they found, but they didn't realize anything was wrong with how they thought; they just thought it was normal.

Naturally, he began to flip.

"Aaaaaahhhhhhh!!!!!" Davis screamed, also blushing in embarrasment, as he pulled on Veemon's jacket a little, to better look at it. "V-Veemon! W-Why am I suddenly wearing your clothes?!?"

"I think it was maybe because of that stupid rock," said Veemon, as he fidgeted nervously, still trying to cover himself with his hands. "When we both touched it at the same time, it must have made us swap outfits. But because you don't normally wear anything, I've ended up naked!"

Davis looked over at his partner and couldn't hold back a laugh.

"Man, Veemon. You look so silly without your clothes on!"

"Well, you look silly, WITH clothes on!" was Veemon's response. "Anyway, we shouldn't stay out here in plain sight for long; not while looking like this."

Veemon looked around the area, searching for something specific.

"Over there," said Veemon and pointed at some bushes. "We can change our outfits back, behind those bushes. And the sooner, the better," he added. "I feel so uncomfortable being in the nude. I don't understand how you how you can go like that all the time, Davis."

"Tell me about it," sighed Davis, looking distinctly uncomfortable wearing Veemon's clothes as they walked behind the bushes. "I don't get how you can even wear these things, Veemon," he said, as he gently tugged on Veemon's shirt and jacket. "They feel really wierd to wear. It's like wearing a curtain or something tightly around my body, at all times. It's unbearable!"

"Hey, speak for yourself," said Veemon. "I don't know how I would make it through the day without my clothes on. Speaking of which, would you mind taking my clothes off and give them back to me, please?"

"Be glad to, Veemon," said Davis, and blushed. "But, err... how do I do that?"

Veemon mentally slapped himself in the face. 'Of course, I forgot,' he thought. 'Since Davis doesn't wear clothes, he doesn't know how to put them on, or take them off.'

"Here, let me help you," he said out loud, as he walked over to Davis, to do just that. "First, we're gonna have to get my shoes and socks off of your feet, so I need you to sit down, Davis. That will make it easier."

"Ten-four, buddy," said Davis and sat down on the forest floor. Veemon then went over to Davis and began to undo the straps on the shoes. When that was done, Veemon pulled the shoes off of his best friend's feet. The socks quickly followed suit.

Davis breathed a sigh of relief. His feet had felt so trapped inside those shoes, so he was glad to feel the grass under his bare feet again.

"Now, Davis," said Veemon. "Before I can get those other clothes off of you, you'll have to take off my goggles and gloves first."

"Okay, pal," said Davis and began to remove the items. But he did so slowly and clumsily, as though he hadn't done it before, (which, in his mind, he hadn't). After taking off the gloves and goggles, he looked at Veemon and asked: "Alright, buddy. What's next?"

"Next thing to remove, is the jacket and the shirt," answered Veemon. "You need to stand up for this, though," he added.

"That's fine," said Davis, as he stood back up again. "You're the expert, Veemon."

"That's right!" proclaimed Veemon proudly, as he jumped up on a large stone behind Davis, so he could reach him better. "I need you to stand with your back to me and then lean your arms towards me, so I can take it off," said Veemon. Davis did as instructed. Veemon then took a firm grip on the jacket and slid it right off of Davis' body. "Now I need you to face me, lean your torso towards me and put your arms over your head," said Veemon. Again, Davis did as instructed. Veemon grasped the shirt and slowly pulled it up over Davis' head, his arms, and then fully off.

With his torso now bare, Davis once more felt relief. Those clothes had felt so restricting to him; he was glad to have them off. Then he realized that there was still one thing remaining, and so did Veemon, both blushing bright crimson at the thought.

Realizing how awkward it would be otherwise, Veemon carefully told Davis precisely how to remove the last piece of clothing on him... The shorts. As Davis was fumbling with the button on the shorts, blushing all the while, he and Veemon made a silent agreement to not tell the other Digidestined about this; they would never hear the end of it! Davis finally unclipped the button and took off the shorts. However, there were still one last thing remaining...

"I don't believe this!" exclaimed Davis. "That stupid rock even gave me your underwear, Veemon!"

Blushing so much that his head looked like a tomato, Veemon said: "Those boxers are easy to remove, though. Just slide them down over your legs and they will come right off, Davis."

Davis did as Veemon told him and as the final constricting piece of fabric was removed from his body, Davis felt the greatest wave of relief yet. Now that he was finally free of those uncomfortable garments, he felt he could breathe again. And, of course, Veemon had gotten his clothes back, and not a moment too soon. He found it really awkward to watch his partner stroll around in the nude.

Veemon picked up all of the discarded clothes and said: "I'm gonna go back there and put these on. I'll be right back!"

"Okay, buddy," said Davis, as he watched Veemon retreat behind a bush. The fact that the clothes were made for use by humans, therefore being much too large for Veemon to properly use, was lost on both of them, thanks to the magical rock they had found.

As soon as Veemon was behind the bush, he immediately began to put on the clothes, starting with the boxers. Though really being too large for him, looking more like shorts on him, he just used his tail as a kind of wegde, to prevent them from falling down, while still allowing him to walk. Then, he put on the shirt. It was so big, it covered his whole body, including his feet, but he took no notice. Next, he put on the shorts, though they were more like a proper pair of pants on his small body, wedging his tail like he did with the boxers, to stop them from coming off. Then he put on his jacket, though he had to roll the sleeves up, to get his tiny arms through them. Then he put on the socks and boots; somehow managing to not rip the socks or boots with his claws, the claws also preventing the boots from slipping off. The gloves was what he put on next. Because Veemon's hands were much like a humans, he could put them on without problems.

Finally, he put the goggles on his head and Veemon was now fully dressed in what he thought to be his clothes. Despite the clothes being almost monstrously oversized on his body, he felt so much more comfortable now, as compared to when he wasn't wearing anything at all.

"Ah, that feels so much better," said Veemon to himself. "It's really nice to have my good, old clothes back on. When we get back, though, I'd better tell Izzy about that crazy rock. Maybe he can find a way to stop it from making more mischief." He checked his pocket, confirming Davis' D-Terminal and D-3 was still there.

As he walked back around the bush, adjusting his goggles in the meantime, he looked up at his now naked partner and asked: "So, Davis. Where should we go now?"

Davis thought about it...

125311211.content:
With their Digimon in tow, Kari and Davis head toward a beach. They are in the Digital World, as far as they know just the two of them came today. "It's weird being here without anyone we need to fight." Kari laments, looking at her partner Gatomon with a smile. "It's peaceful..." Davis chuckles and nods. "Sure is... Hey, let's go for a swim." he suggests without really thinking it through. "Uh, Davis? We only have the clothes on our backs." He nods, "Oh right, nevermind..." He sighs. Veemon butts in, "Just swim in your undies, if you wipe them dry you'll have no trouble." Gatomon smiles, "Sure, I'll stay here and guard your clothes. I don't like getting wet..." she sticks her tongue out. "Why thank you, Gatomon."

The two humans strip down to their undies and dive in, having a nice long swim without even Veemon interrupting their rest. It kind of helps he keeps swimming to get better, while they just swim as they wish. It's not even half an hour before they decide to head back to shore, partly to keep Gatomon from feeling left out, but mostly from being tired. Back at shore they approach Gatomon, wondering what she's doing which amounts to sunbathing. "Done already?" she asks with a cute little yawn. "Yeah, come on." She hands them their clothes back, but asks a pretty curious question. "Why do you guys dress so differently?" Veemon nods, "Yeah, you two especially."

Kari shakes her head, "It's just what I like to wear, guys. I think I look cute." The other 3 agree she does, making her blush a bit. "I mean, part of it is that I'm a girl and he's a guy, but I'm not sure how to explain our style choices..." Gatomon smiles, "Humans are so weird, right Veemon?" Veemon nods while Davis gets his word in. "My style is just as good as Kari's." Gatomon sticks her tongue out, "Then why don't you wear pink for a change?" Kari giggles again, and the boy looks her in the eyes. "Maybe I'd look good in it, but why don't you take after her?" Gatomon huffs, and Veemon thinks. "Why don't you guys trade clothes?" Gatomon nods, "Yeah, if you trade clothes for a while, I'll wear whatever Davis wants for a week." Veemon smiles, "I'll wear what Kari wants for a week too, what do you guys say?"

After a short discussion, Kari and Davis agree to trade outfits until their Digimon are satisifed they've worn them long enough. They hand each other their clothes. First, Kari dresses in front of the others into Davis' flame jacket, green shorts, and gloves, pulling on his socks and shoes. "Ugh, this does feel weird, Davis. How do you stand it?" she feels a lot of room in the shorts, taking out Davis' goggles and wearing them too.

Davis stands in front of the others, pulling Kari's shorts high over his waist and tightening her belt to keep it where she does, feeling it push at his genitals just a bit much. Next comes her shirt, a very feminine pink and white that makes him question his decision. It's amazing their shoes fit, he thinks, pulling his feet into Kari's pink and white shoes. He saves her gloves for last, pulling them up and trying to get them over his shoulder, but they fall short of where Kari wears them as is. He stands, blushing softly, looking at the Digimon with Kari at his side now. She slips her necklace around his neck when she comes up to him.
