13.content:
In Shinjuku, it was a seemingly normal day for the inhabitants of the city. People went about their usual daily lives. Unknown to them, a small Digital Field suddenly opened up in a remote area of the park, and out of it appeared a small card. This card possessed a mysterious and strange power, and would cause very strange things to happen to those who found it.

And as this card appeared, it didn't go completely unnoticed, as it was detected by the D-Power of any of the Digimon Tamers that might have been in the area.

The Digimon Tamers
Takato and Guilmon
Rika and Renamon
Henry and Terriermon
Ryo and Cyberdramon
Jeri and Calumon
Kazu and Guardromon
Kenta and MarineAngemon
Suzie and Lopmon
13.title: Season 3/Tamers

131.content:
Elsewhere in the park, the whole group of Tamers of Takato, Henry, Rika, Jeri, Kazu, Kenta, Suzie, Ryo, their partners and Calumon were all gathered together at Guilmon's old hideout, just hanging out for the day. As they did, they suddenly heard a beeping noise coming from their D-Powers. Pulling them out, they saw that the radars were all activated and pointing them in the same direction.

"Looks like a Digimon has just appeared." Takato said.

"Well, I guess that means we should go see if its gonna be a problem or not." Rika said, and everybody left to go to where ever their D-Powers were taking them.

As they entered into the area, they were surprised that their wasn't any Digimon there, even though their D-Powers had told them to go here. "I don't see anything." Kenta said.

"Maybe there is something wrong with our D-Powers." Rika

"Hey, check that out." Kazu pointed, and everybody noticed that card lying on the ground in the middle of the clearing. Walking over to it, they saw that it was completely white, except for the symbol that looked like a question mark in the center. It almost reminded them of the Blue Cards, if only because of how weird it was. Cecking their D-Powers confirmed that it was indeeding what they were being lead to.

"What should we do about it?" Jeri asked.

"I don't know." Ryo said.

"Well, I don't think we should just leave it here." Henry said. "Maybe we can have my dad take a look at it, and see if he can find out what it does."

"That sounds like a good idea." Takato said, then reached down to pick it up. As he held it out for everyone to see as they all gathered around it. As the group took a closer look at it, it suddenly began to glow brightly, and emitted a bright flash of light that engulfed them all.


Now, what will happen to them?

1322112.content:
... As the light faded, leaving behind a faint pink mist, Takato slowly forced himself up to stand. His eyes darted around him, unsure of what had just happened to him and his partner. Doing his best to grip his nerves, he he pulled his goggles down over his eyes with one hand and gripped the D-Ark in the other.

'Darn it, what just happened?' he thought to himself in silence. Shaking himself free of his stupor, Takato shouted out his partner's name, "Guilmon! Guilmon, where are you?"

He wondered through the fog for a few moments until a groggy voice started to mumble something completely incoherent. Takato of course knew what that meant as he only knew of one Digimon that could sound that silly in it's sleep. "Guilmon!"

As Takato rushed towards the voice until spoke, in a highly feminine manner, "Just five more minutes, Takatomon..."

"What the... Guilmon?" Takato ran even faster now, right up until he saw what he could not have been prepared for... a female version of her partner. It looked so much like his normal design, with a few "noticeable" changes. Guilmon's face was much more gentle and cute, almost sexy and her body was tirm, much like that of Renamon's, but much more curvy. Of course, being a teenager meant his eyes first went Guilmon's newest add on: her massive breast and large butt. Then, he noticed that her over all color was lighter, bordering on pink. Other than that, he- she looked just like she normally did.

Finally with her eyes slowly opening, Guilmon blinked a few times, looking around as she got up, before expression changed to one of absolute fear. She, now standing only slightly taller than her Tamer, the dino girl digimon grabbed him by his head and hugged him tight into her breast.

"Oh, Takatomon! I was having such bad dream! There was lots of pink and-" Guilmon stopped, sniffing her Tamer's hair, "You're hair smells nice."

Managing to pull away to breath Takato , "This cannot be happening. What are we-" he paused, noticing that Guilmon was just now realizing that she had breast and was playing with them much like a child. "Well, what am I gonna do now?"

Thinking it over,

1322112121.content:
The fog overtook Takato's body, Guilmon watched his tamer disappear into the fog. "Takatomon? Where are you?" Asked Guilmon, in a sultry feminine tone. "Guilmon, help!" Exclaimed a voice that sounded very much like Guilmon's. Guilmon walked in to the fog, and found Takato's clothing lying on the ground. Guilmon ran into the fog, and smacked right into another female Guilmon. "Is that you, Takatomon?" Asked Guilmon, as she tilted her head in confusion. "Yes..." Said Takato begrudgingly, "I became a copy of you..." Takato stood up abruptly, causing her massive breasts to bob as he did. He inspected his body, and found it covered in pinkish-red scales, and found that her ass was now massive.

"Yay Takatomon, we're sisters!" Exclaimed Guilmon, as she grabbed Takato and hugged him. Guilmon's scaly breasts rubbed against Takato's equally massive melons, as Guilmon hugged his former tamer. "This isn't a time for games, Guilmon! We've become female Digimon, and we need to return to normal right now!" Exclaimed Takato, as he searched around for her digivice. The fog began to fade, and eventually Takato found her digivice. However, the device wouldn't respond when Takato pressed the buttons. It didn't recognize her DNA signal, and the device failed to respond. "Darn it! I hope we're not stuck this way!" Suddenly, Takato felt a smack on her scaly behind. "Sorry Takatomon, couldn't resist!" Takato let out an angered feminine growl, as Guilmon nervously backed up.

"Sorry, boy!" Said Takato in an apologetic manner, "I shouldn't take it out on you!" Guilmon laughed, "But Takatomon, neither of us are boys!" Takato let out a giggle, as she tried to think of a way out of this. "We should probably find Henry, his father helped create Digimon! If we found him, we should be back to normal in no time!" Guilmon smirked, "Or we could have some fun, Takatomon! Two Digi-Girls just having fun!" Takato thought about it, it was a rare opportunity to have some fun... However, Takato was more focussed on returning to normal immediately. She ultimately decides on...

The two of them go to look for Impmon so they can tease him

As much as Takatomon wanted to change back, she was tempted by Guilmon's idea. Being a female Digimon might be fun, after all she could always find Henry's dad later. "Alright bo--- I mean girl, let's do it!" Exclaimed Takato, as Guilmon started jump around while giggling. Her massive tits bounced, as her feminine body hopped up and down. "Yay, Takatomon! I can't wait to try those girly things Renamon and Rika always talk about! Sleepover parties, gossip, I don't know what those are, but they sound fun!" Takato walked over to her pile of clothes and grabbed her goggles, gripping them in his paws. She put the goggle-strap in her claws, and went to work fastening his goggles around his head. It was hard getting it over her reptilian head, but she eventually managed to do it. After fastening the goggles, she turned her well-endowed body towards Guilmon. "Uh... What's so funny Guilmon?" Asked Takato, as she crossed her arms like a woman. "We don't look exactly the same..." Said Guilmon, as she pointed with one of her claws at Takato's chest. Takato walked closer, and decided to compare breast sizes with Guilmon. As it turned out, Takato's breasts were at least two sizes larger then Guilmon's! "Takatomon, you're more of a hottie then I am!" Takato blushed and kicked his paw in the dirt, "Aw shucks, you're embaressing me."

"So, Takatomon..." Began Guilmon, "Maybe we should change our names, so no one gets suspicious!" Exclaimed Guilmon, as she began to play with her breasts again. "Well... How about you be Guilwomon, and I'll be BrainyGuilwomon!" Exclaimed Takato, now known as BrainyGuilwomon. "Alright, Brainy! Let's go have a night on the town!"          "Takatomon, do you know what happened?" Rika asked. "I... have no idea..." Said "Takato". It didn't take too long for them to figure out that they had all swapped bodies. Takato was now Renamon, Rika was now Guilmon, Guilmon was Rika, and Renamon was Takato. "Nice going, Rika!" Exclaimed the now fluffy Takato. "Ok, how is this my fault! Those colored cards usually mean---" Rika began to say until Takato cut her off in mid-sentence "Oh, it "usually means!" Oh, I guess that solved all of our problems!" Renamon looked at both of them and said "You two need to calm down. Rika, you were extremely hasty today and it could've been the end of us if rogue digimon were around. You both have no idea how to fight in those bodies. What we need to do it require to our quarters and think of a way to fix this."

         However, this statement made Rika even more angry and volatile. "What?! WHAT?! I'm not going to spend the night in Guilmon's hollowed-out cave!" She exclaimed. However, the now male Renamon just looked at her and said "Rika, this is your fault! And besides, at much as Takato's family enjoys Guilmon, they wouldn't let him sleep inside. "I... fine! Until we get this sorted out, I'll stay there." Said Rika while swallowing her pride. "Wow, Takatomon, girls are confusing." Stated Guilmon. "Uh... Guilmon,, you are a girl." Takato fired back. It was going to be a long night...

Who should we focus on for now?
1332212.title: Rika with Guilmon and Renamon with Takato

choices: Impmon began tapping on the window
13322121.content:
Takato and Guilmon arrived at Rika's house. Takato stood there nervously before taking a deep breath in and exhaling. "Well, this is going to be tough." Stated Takato. Guilmon gave a curious look at Takato, something Rika never did and said "Takatomon, you are acting like we are facing the D-Reaper again!" Said Guilmon. "Not the D-Reaper, Guilmon, Rika's parents. I don't want to act off and give them the tip that we are not Renamon and Rika." Said the new Renamon, while beginning to take nervous steps up the front porch. "Just let me all the talking, boy. You'll just embarrass us." Said Takato with his stern new feminine voice. They knocked on the front door and were greeted by Rika's mother. "Rika! Renamon! Come on in!" The two of them walked in rather sheepishly. Luckily, Rika's mom didn't take notice of this. "Rika and I are going to head upstairs for a while. We have some important... Business to take care of." Said Takato in a rather fearful voice.

         "Well, Just don't miss supper you two!" Said Rika's mom in a very happy-go-lucky voice. The two walked up to Rika's room and Takato Immediately threw himself on the bed. "Oh god, I just don't feel right about this, Guilmon." Takato said while burying his face in his paws. "Takatomon, I thought you said this was Rika's fault!" Said Guilmon. "It is her fault, I just don't get why she does this to us! She always acts like she's better than everyone else. I still can't believe she would just up and use some random card she found!" Exclaimed Takato. "Well, maybe the card took over her mind!" Said Guilmon. "Yeah, I freaking doubt it, boy! All I know now is that we are both girls. This cannot get any worse!" Exclaimed Takato while picking up one of the bed's pillows and tossing across the room. Just then...
13322121.title: Takato and Guilmon

133221211.content:
Just as Takato was beginning to calm himself down a bit, he heard a knock on the door. "Uh... Who's there?" Asked Takato. "Renamon, it's me Henry! Can I come in?" Asked Henry. Takato looked over to Guilmon, and gave him a "Shush!" to keep him from blowing their cover. "Uh... C'mon in Henry!" Said Takato, who was unsure of the whole thing. "Alright. I'm coming in!" Henry walked in with a rather desperate look on his face. "Guys--- I mean girls, something is wrong with Takato and Guilmon!" Exclaimed Henry, who was trying his best to hold back his fear. "What happened exactly?" Asked Takato, who was extremely curious about the chaos Rika and Renamon were causing in their bodies. "Well I tried talking to them and Takato was way more serious than usual! He kept saying he was busy and he kept telling me to leave! Also, he walked away in a feminine manner with his hips swaying. What's up with that?" Asked Henry, which made Takato feel extremely embarrassed.

         "And... What about Ri--- I mean Guilmon?" Asked Takato. "Well he... flipped me off. I didn't even know he knew what that meant." Stated Henry. Takato put a paw over his head and sighed. "Renamon, do you know what's going on with Takato?" Asked Henry. "Henry" Said Takato in a serious manner "How big is your suspension of dis-belief?" Henry looked at him with a rather confused expression. "Well I'm talking to a giant yellow fox, and a girl who can manipulate the abilities of said fox using magic trading cards. Not to mention the fact we just defeated a giant gelatinous slime monster that almost killed everyone. Yeah, I'd say I've seen it all. So, what did you want to tell me?" Asked Henry.

         "Well... Me, Guilmon, Renamon and Rika have sort of... swapped bodies." Stated Takato. "I'm trying to be serious here, Renamon. On top of that, if you wanted me to believe something like that you'd need substantial proof." Said Henry, who crossed his arms in dis-belief. Takato wandered over to him, and moved his large paw towards Henry's shirt, pressing a black claw against his shoulder. "You've been selling your sister's dolls to Impmon so he could use them as target practice." Said Takato. "Wait, how would you know about that? I've been telling Impmon that I got them from one of my cousin's garage sales so I could use their stuffing for pillows. And the only one I told about it was Takato!" Said Henry. "That's because I'm Takato. And Guilmon is standing right over there!" He said while motioning to Guilmon who was Rika's skin. "Howdy Henry!" Stated Guilmon, in a voice that didn't befit Rika's body at all. "Oh god... It's true, I've gone insane! What's going to happen next? Is a gun-toting priest, and a group of three demons going to ride out of an alternate dimensional portal on a jeep that magically transforms into a dragon?" Asked Henry. Then suddenly...
133221211.title: Henry walked in

choices: Henry and Terriermon show up to help even the odds
Takato has to battle Goku on his own
1332212111.content:
Suddenly, before Henry could a grip of himself a large tear in the sky opened. "Oh no, is a Digimon materializing?" Asked Henry. "I'm not sure, but that tear looks completely different! It's got a strange golden color, and it seems to be pulsating with a strange energy!" Exclaimed Takato. "Well... Takato and Guilmon let's go after it." Said Henry begrudgingly. "Finally, you believe me! I'll explain the rest to you later, let's get going!" Shouted Takato as he made a break for the door. Guilmon, Henry and Takato run out the door and begin their trek through the streets. Takato becomes increasingly bothered by the fact that his new tail keeps dragging the ground. "Darn it! This tail tracks in so most dust and dirt, I'm surprised Renamon can even stand it!" Exclaimed Takato. "Takato, WHO CARES?! Renamon is a Digmon which is like a wild animal! She can't even take showers, because fur probably clogs up the drain! So stop worrying about personal hygiene and be a man!" Shouted Henry, who was getting increasingly annoyed by the whole scenario.

         Takato just looked at him with an angered expression on his face and said "How can I be a man right now, if I'm trapped in a woman's body?" He asked sarcastically. Henry ignored his remarks and continued running. They eventually made it to the tear, where Yamaki was already there waiting. "Well, Henry you forgetting something?" Asked Yamaki. "Oh god, Henry you forgot Terriermon!" Exclaimed Takato, causing Yamaki to shoot angered glances at Henry. "Look don't worry guys, we've got Renamon right here with us! There's no we can lose!" Said Henry trying to lighten the moon. Takato once again buried his paws in his face. "Just... Shut up, Henry." Said Takato. Suddenly the gate began to glow and split wide open.

         Takato, Henry, Guilmon and Yamaki hear a group of four voices screaming in synchronization as a strange object begins to fall to the ground it lands with a thud in an alleyway, a couple of blocks away. "Okay, here's the plan! Yamaki, I want you stay here and keep tabs on any possible gates opening. Henry, you go home and grab Terriermon so you can actually be of some use. "Rika" and I will go after whatever popped out of the gates. Any questions?" Asked Takato. Yamaki retorts "Yeah, just one. When did you become Takato?" Henry and Takato shoot glances at each other. "Well... We'll explain later." Stated Takato, who immediately ran off with Guilmon.

         Guilmon and Takato eventually reach the alleyway where the metallic object landed. "Okay boy, as with our previous encounters I want you to keep silent. We'll lose our intimidation factor if you talk." Said Takato. "But Takatomon, how will I be able to digi-modify with my mouth shut?" Asked Guilmon. Takato looked at him and said "You'll find a way, Guilmon I believe in you." The two run towards the object and find something they weren't expecting. Four humans dressed in strange garb. The first one appeared to be a priest in a magnificent golden and white robe. He had short blonde hair and had a nasty looking frown his face. He was clutching a cigarette which he began to puff on. Another one was wearing a blue outfit with a white shirt and blue head band. His hair had a strange red coloring to it, that was unlike any hair color he had ever seen. He had a strange crescent bladed staff and was arguing with another member of their crew.

         The other one had spikey brown hair and wore a strange golden diadem, along with an orange cape and red and white shirt. He sported typical blues jeans and had strange golden eyes. He looked rather young when compared to the other The last one wore an odd looking green and white shirt that an oriental feel to it. He also sported brown spikey hair, though he looked to be the smarter one of the bunch with his fancy little monacle He was clutching a white dragon in both his hands. Takato has no idea how to proceed. These guys looked like serious business, and they weren't at all Digimon. Takato tried to get a better look, but ended up knocking over a garbage can, causing the gang to notice him. The blonde priest pulled out a handgun and pointed it at the strange fox creature. "Oh look, another demon. It must be one of Gyumao's servants!"

         "Wait I'm not a demon! I'm a Digimon!" Exclaimed Takato. "Doesn't matter what you are! Because now you're gonna be fox stew!" Shouted the brown haired boy. "Have fun with her, Goku but make sure there's something left for dinner!" Said the other brown haired man. Goku snapped his fingers and a red and golden staff materialized out of his right hand. Takato was really in for it now, what happens next?
1332212111.title: Enter: The Sanzo party!

choices: Decided to use the card for himself
13322121112.content:
Before Takato could talk his way out of it, Goku attacked with his staff. Takato kept dodging his attacks trying to think of what to do. Would it be considered wrong to attack him considering he's a human? However, he wasn't like any other human Takato ever encountered. Goku attacked him with a powerful staff that could extend at any time he wanted. On top of that, no matter how much he ran out around, he never seemed to run out of energy. Takato finally decided to take things seriously and whacked him with one of his large paws. This knocked Goku back a bit, but didn't seem to do any damage to him in the least. "Takatomon!" Shouted Guilmon, who was running towards him. "Guilmon! Digi-modify! Use the tomahawk!" Guilmon took the card and immediately swiped it. Takato began to shine, and now possessed a tomahawk he could fight Goku with, blade to blade.

         "I see the foxy lady has some tricks up her sleeves... Or gloves. You're not like any demon I've ever faced!" Said Goku with a confident smirk forming on his face. "Like I said before, I'm not a demon! I'm a Digimon, a creature from the digital world! Now go away, I have better things to do today then fight some punk with a staff!" Shouted Takato while brandishing his Tomahawk. "Oh wow, I'm so scared! Tell me foxy lady, would you prefer chipotle or basil leaves in your stew?" Asked Goku sarcastically. Takato ignored that comment and went on the attack. Takato matched Goku blow for blow, the battle was intense. Takato was used to fighting while merged with Guilmon, so he was not stranger to how combat worked.

         He eventually got the upper-hand and began decimating Goku. Knocking the staff out of Goku's hand he began pummelling him with the tomahawk. However, Takato had underestimated Goku's tenacity. Goku punched the Tomahawk out of Takato's paw and began pummelling him senselessly with his fists. Punch after punch, until Takato lied there covered in dust, and dirt. "Goku, you're taking too long!" Said the golden haired priest who just entered the scene. "I'll finish her off with my banishing gun!" Goku looked at the priest and said "Hey Sanzo, I don't think she's one of Gyumao's guys. She doesn't seem to want to fight, on top of that she doesn't appear to be like any demon we've ever faced!" Stated Goku.

         Sanzo took out a cigarette and lit it, placing it closely to his lips. After a few puffs he said "Like I care, if it gets in our way it's toast. Good or bad I live by my own rules." Stated the priest who pointed his gun at Takato. "Woah, stop I'm not---!" Before Takato could finish the priest took out his gun and took a pot-shot at him. Takato managed to dodge but the bullet brushed the fur on his should. "It's not a demon, the banishing gun has no effect." Said Sanzo. Immediately the other two humans ran up. "Sanzo what happened here?" Asked the red-haired one. "This thing fought with Goku, however it eventually lost. Though I think something like this would definitely make a good slave" Said the priest. "How about a pet? It could be a travelling companion for Hakuryuu." Stated the brown haired man.

         "You're wise beyond you're years, Hakkai. Considering this thing can fight it might help us out of a jam. It would be great if it could decrease our workload." Said the red-haired man. Takato looked like a nervous wreck, standing before four men who could easily wipe him out. Was this the end for our new Digimon? Who are these mysterious new strangers? Find out on the next episode of... Actually find out right now! Before Takato could run away, he heard a voice boom in the background exclaiming "Bunny blaster!" With that sound, came a barrage of bullets, that caused the four humans to scatter like mice. "Oh god, Henry! You sure took your sweet time!" Exclaimed Takato. "That's because I found this on the way!" Henry stated while pulling out a strange orange card. "Henry, you magnificent tamer! That's the card we need to swap back!" Exclaimed Takato triumphantly. "Oh that's what it does? I swiped one earlier and it did nothing."

         "Wait what?" Said Takato, while hoisting himself off the ground. "Yeah, it did absolutely nothing. Also, may I ask who were those guys attacking you?" Asked Henry. "Well there was a gun-wielding priest who was a chain-smoker, and I'm pretty sure those guys were demons and--- Wait? Why does that sound familiar?" Asked Takato. "Oh god, didn't I make some kind of joke about those guys earlier? I wonder what happened to make that wish come true." Asked Henry, while scratching his head confusingly. Takato suddenly began thinking deeply about was going on.

         "I figured it out! Those cards must be some kind of weird wish fulfillment Digi-modify. Quick let's round up the others and swap back!" Said Takato. Henry...

133322122.title: A total mix-up of human and Digimon personalities

1333221221.content:
How much will they swap their personalities?


Option 1: They swap their personalities partially; meaning that they are still themselves, but they have each others personality traits. (So, fx, Rika will have Guilmon's love of bread, Renamon will have Takato's slightly goofy behaviour, ect...)


Option 2: They swap their personalities completely; meaning that while they still have their own physical bodies and all abilities corresponding to that body, they now believe they are really each other and that they have the normal bodies corresponding to their new personalities. (So fx, Renamon will still have her own furry, female, Digimon body, her own female voice and her Digimon attacks. But since she now has Takato's entire personality, she, and the other three personality-swapped friends, now believes she really IS Takato and as such has Takato's normal, male, human body, his male voice and is unable to use any special attacks, because they all believe she is a male human. Also, since she now thinks she is really Takato, she is going to freak out about wearing her purple gloves and about Takato wearing his own clothes; because since they now believe that they are each other, they also think that they are suddenly wearing each others clothes. In other words, 'Takato', meaning Renamon with Takato's personality, is going to freak out about being almost naked, since 'he' is only wearing 'Renamon's' gloves, and 'Renamon', meaning Takato with Renamon's personality, is going to feel uncomfortable, hot and ticked off at now wearing 'Takato's' clothes, since the garments are squeezing 'her tail' and combined with 'her fur' is making 'her' feel really warm. Same thing and vice versa with the others.)
1333221221.title: How much will they swap their personalities?

13332212212.content: Finally; how fast are they going to swap their personalities; Instantly or gradually?
13332212212.title: Last choice before the story itself

133322122122.content:
Renamon slowly regained conciousness. What had happened? She started to remember... She and her Tamer, Rika, had helped Takato and Guilmon stop a rampaging Volcamon downtown. On their way home, the four of them took a shortcut through the park, where they had found a wierd, green, Digimon Card. Curious about what the Card would do, Rika had swiped it through her Digivice, then there had been a bright flash. Next thing Renamon knew, she was on the ground.

'That was wierd,' thought Renamon. 'The Card didn't do anything. I certainly don't feel like I do when Rika uses Digimodify with other Cards. Exept maybe a little cold; it's rather breezy here...'

As she blinked the stars out of her eyes, she could hear the others had woken up too. 'I wonder what...' Renamon didn't get to finish that train of thought, as two screams suddenly pierced the air. It was Takato and Rika screaming!

Renamon suddenly jumped up on instinct and went into a battle stance. Since her sight had returned, she started looking around to see why her Tamer was screaming. "Rika, are you..." she started to say, but she froze when she saw the sight before her.

Unreal! She couldn't believe it! Yet it was right in front of her. As she looked at the wierd spectacle, she suddenly thought of that cold feeling she had before. 'Don't tell me...' she thought, as she moved her gaze downwards to look at herself.

Even Renamon's diciplined mind didn't prevent her from letting out a gasp of shock, as she unfortunatly found out that her suspicions were right. Her clothes had dissapeared! She was not wearing anything! Well, not completely true. The only piece of clothing on her furry yellow-and-white body, was a pair of long, purple gloves with a Yin-Yang symbol on them. Renamon recognised them immediately. They were Takato's gloves! But other than that, she was buck-naked!

Blushing profusely, Renamon tried to preserve a little modesty by covering her near-naked body with her paws. 'I had a feeling that this was the case,' Renamon thought to herself, 'But it's hard not to be embarassed by this.' She looked up at the two Tamers again, to check on them.

The reason why Renamon had that feeling, was right in front of her and it was why the Tamers were freaking out; somehow they were all wearing each others clothes! Renamon observed that Takato looked like he was frozen in shock; not surprising since he was wearing Renamon's clothes: the white T-shirt, the blue hooded shirt, the yellow wristbands, the long gray shorts, the white socks, the green converse sneakers and the yellow goggles; all of it Renamon's! And Takato was wearing it!

Renamon knew that Takato only ever wore those purple gloves of his; he had for as long as she had known him. So, for him to suddenly wear the full set of clothes of a Digimon, must be uncomfortable for him, she reasoned. Especially since, unlike herself and Guilmon, he didn't know how to properly put on or remove any other article of clothing, that much she knew. And the reason why Renamon knew that she had switched clothes with Takato, was because the same thing had happened to Rika and Guilmon!

Guilmon being, well, Guilmon, was largely unaffected by the whole thing. All he did was just observing everything curiously in spite of him looking funny being completly naked! The same thing could not be said of Rika. The look on her face was an odd mix between shock, anger and disgust. Renamon fully understood why Rika behaved like that. Ever since Rika became her Tamer, Renamon knew that Rika never worn clothes in her life. Rika always felt that any clothes were way too stuffy and uncomfortable for her to wear. Also, like Takato, since Rika never wore clothes, she had no idea how to put them on or take them off.

So, for Rika to suddenly wear Guilmon's clothes would be quite an ordeal for her; Renamon was certain of that. Indeed, Rika looked utterly mortified to be wearing Guilmon's clothes; the hairband, the turquoise-sleaved turtlenecked T-shirt with the dark-blue heart on the front, the short button-fly blue jeans, the red wristbands, the white socks, the red steel-toed sneakers and the buckles that Guilmon usually wore around his waist and left leg. Add in the the fact that, while Rika did consider Guilmon a friend, he was also the Digimon that she was annoyed with the most and the uncomfortable feeling would skyrocket.

For a moment, Renamon just stood and stared like the others. Then Guilmon broke the ice by innocently asking: "Takato, how come you are dressed like Renamon and Renamon dressed like you? And why is Rika dressed like me and I'm dressed like her? Is this some kind of new game?"

Takato managed to snap himself out of his funk, as he shakingly answered: "I-I-I don't know wh-why we're all d-dressed like each other, Guilmon. And no; it's not some new game."

"Awww, too bad," sighed Guilmon. "It looked like it could have been a fun game."

"Fun? FUN?! YOU WOULD CONSIDER THIS TO BE FUN?!?" yelled Rika. Both Takato and Guilmon took a few steps back due to Rika's tone of voice, but Renamon decided to intervene, before her Tamer would start ranting again.

"Calm down, Rika," said Renamon sharply, as she stepped in front of Rika. "It's not Guilmon's fault and you know how hard it is for him to be serious."

"That's still no excuse!" exclaimed Rika. "I mean, look at this!" She tugged on both Guilmon's turtlenecked T-shirt and his button-fly jeans, that she now wore. "I can't stand being dressed in that stupid lizards uncomfortable clothes and all he does is treating it like some Circus act!" She pointed at Guilmon, who was currently busy examining how he looked without his clothes on.

Renamon snorted. "So? You think you're the only one here who feels uncomfortable with what you currently wear?" Renamon said. She was fidgeting around, still blushing slightly and trying to cover as much of her near-naked body as possible with her paws. "I don't like being almost naked, but I don't have much choice since Takato is wearing my clothes at the moment." They both looked over at Takato. He was also fidgeting nervously, but in his case, it was from wearing clothes, instead of not wearing them. Looking back at Rika, Renamon added: "But I hope it won't be for long. Wearing nothing but gloves is embarrasing enough, but those gloves also itch to high heaven."

"Hey, speak for yourself!" exclaimed Takato, who had heard what they said. He was scratching himself, as he went over to them. "How can you even wear these things, Renamon? They feel so hot and stuffy. It's like walking around with a blanket wrapped around me, all of the time." He tugged on Renamon's hodded shirt and her long shorts. "If I knew how to take them off, I would take them off. Besides, they aren't really my colour."

"Yeah, I know what you mean," said Rika, as she tugged on Guilmon's T-shirt and blue jeans. "I have no idea how to get this off either."

"Careful you two," said Renamon. "If you keep tugging on the clothes like that, they might rip, and neither Guilmon nor myself would want that to happen." "Right! Sorry!" said the two Tamers at the same time and stopped the tugging.

"Hey, how do you guys think we swapped clothes, anyways?" asked Guilmon. "Well," said Renamon. "I think it might be because of that odd Modify Card we found." "I think that's a sound assumption," said Takato. "Yeah, I think so too," said Rika. "I agree with whatever you agree with, Takato," said Guilmon.

They were wrong though. The Modify Card had not swapped their clothes around. As a matter of fact, they all had their usual clothes on, but all of them thought that they were dressed like each other.

What the Green Card really did, was swapping a part of their personalities around; specifically the part about who would wear clothes and who would not. Every time they would swipe the Green Card, another small part of their personalities would switch.

Of course the four friends didn't know that, so they thought that the Card had swapped their clothes around.

After they came to the solution that the Modify Card had swapped their clothes, they thought if they swiped it again, it might return everything to normal. Only one problem: the Card had disappeared!

"Great," groaned Rika. "How are we going to swap our clothes back now?" "We'll have to do it manually," said Renamon. "We need to switch them back and soon." "There are some big bushes over there that we can change behind," said Takato. No sooner said, than done, they were ready to swap what they thought to be their own clothes back.

Which pair should we follow?
133322122122.title: A strange Modify Card...

133331.title: Life swaps

1333311.content:
As the light died down, it became quickly apparent that something had happened. For starters, Rika was now standing where Renamon had been standing, and vice versa. More importantly, Renamon was now wearing Rika's clothes, her feet somehow fitting perfectly into Rika's shoes, her tail poking out from the waistband of the pants, and some of the fur atop her head pulled back in Rika's "pineapple" style. Rika, meanwhile, now had her hair down and was wearing Renamon's gloves... and nothing else.

Rika gave a yelp and turned bright red, crossing her now gloved arms over her body in a vain attempt at modesty.

"What's going on?!" the normally stoic Tamer practically shrieked, "What just happened? Why are you wearing my clothes?!"

"I don't know," Renamon replied in shock, "All I can think of is that that card must have somehow done this. And now it seems to have disappeared."

"Well find it!" Rika snapped, "And hurry before someone sees me!"
1333311.title: Life swap with each other

choices: The other Tamers suddenly showed up.
13333112.content:
Suddenly, Rika's digivice - attached to the belt currently around Renamon's waist - started beeping, as a digital field suddenly popped into existence a few feet away, just as suddenly disappearing to reveal an Ogremon. The green brute's gaze wandered for a moment, before settling on the still slightly disoriented Rika and Renamon. Smiling nastily, he raised his club and started stomping towards them.

"Stay back!" Renamon shouted to her Tamer, before attempting to leap at the Ogremon, only to fall short as she only managed a simple short hop.

"What?" she muttered, before Ogremon suddenly smacked her aside with the club.

"Stay outta this, human," he growled.

"What?" Renamon thought as she tried to stand up, "Why did he call me human? And why did that hurt so much? I've taken worse!"

"Pummel whack!" Ogremon shouted, launching the attack at the shocked Rika. The girl instinctively jumped back to avoid the attack. In fact, she leapt up, did a backflip mid-air, and landed in a crouch on the branch of a nearby tree. She blinked in the surprise as she realized what she had just done.

"What the hell? How'd I do that?"

She had no time to think about it, as Ogremon charged her again, waving his club in the air.

"Fight me coward!" he yelled, leaping at her. Once again, Rika acted on instinct, leaping towards her opponent and kicking him square in the jaw. Rather than realistically breaking her foot, she sent the larger monster flying back to land on his back, while she performed a three-point landing a few feet away from him.

Looking up and panting heavily, Rika risked a look away from Ogremon and shared a glance with Renamon, who had managed to get to her feet. The two stared at each other as they both pondered the same thing: What was going on?
13333112.title: A digimon suddenly attacks.

choices: Rika finishes Ogremon off with Renamon's abilities.
133331122.content:
An idea suddenly hit Renamon, and she quickly grabbed Rika's digivice and deck, searching for a card.

"What are you doing?" Rika shouted, as she continued to dodge Ogremon's attacks.

"Testing a theory," Renamon replied, before finding a useful card and slashing it, "WarGreymon's shield, activate!"

Before Rika could react, a jolt of energy passed through her, and she instinctively brought her arms up in front of herself as Ogremon brought his club down again. Light shined around Rika's arms and formed into the familiar golden shield, which blocked the club. Rika shuddered from the impact and was pushed back several feet, but was surprisingly not knocked over. The same instinct that had been guiding her during the fight kicked in again, and she pushed back with the shield, knocking Ogremon off balance. She then swept out her leg, knocking Ogremon's legs out from under him before slamming the shield down on him, stunning him.

Breathing heavily, Rika took the opportunity to turn to look at Renamon again.

"So I can use the cards?" she asked.

"Apparently," Renamon replied, looking as stunned as Rika felt.
133331122.title: Renamon slashed a card.

1333311222.content: Does Renamon use the digivolve card?
1333311222.title: Something else

13333112221.content:
As Ogremon groaned and started to climb to his feet, while the WarGreymon shield dissolved back into data, something clicked in Renamon's head, and she reached for another card.

"What are you doing?" Rika asked, backing away from the recovering Ogremon but not taking her eyes off him.

"Ending this," Renamon replied in a more stern-sounding voice than usual, before slashing the card, "Digivolution activate!"

"What? I can't digivol-gah!" Rika's protests were cut off as she felt another jolt of energy go through her, this one much stronger than the last. She felt something within her shifting as her body was engulfed in a bright light. When the light died down, it immediately became apparent that the card had had something similar to its desired effect.

Rika now looked older, perhaps in her late teens or early twenties. She was taller, her body now leaner and more muscular (not to mention her breasts having grown to about a B-cup), while her hair had grown out dramatically, now reaching down to her legs.

More immediately apparent, however, were the fact that she was crouched over on both hands and feet, and was wearing a collar around her neck composed of four intertwined ropes that ended in metal balls. If anything, it looked like she was supposed to be dressed up like Renamon's Champion-level form Kyubimon.

Before Rika could process what had just happened to her, Ogremon - now mostly recovered - lashed out at her with his club. Once again acting on her newfound instincts, Rika leapt over the swing and pounced on Ogremon, her hands striking him in the throat and knocking him back to the ground, before flipping over him and landing once more on all fours.

As Ogremon tried to get back to his feet again, Rika felt a force rising up in her, only barely noticing as her lengthy hair began rising up to hover in the air in nine distinct strands, spectral blue flames appearing on the ends of the strands. She barely even thought about what she was saying or doing as she made her next move.

"Fox tail inferno!" she shouted, the flames shooting from the hair strands at Ogremon. The ogre digimon only had time to scream as he burned, before the flames destroyed him and he dissolved into data.

As the data floated away, Rika and Renamon looked at each. Rika's body glowed again, and when the light dissipated, she was once again her proper age, wearing Renamon's gloves, and standing only on her feet.

1333312222221.title: Yes

choices: Keep following Rika's new dog life.
Switch to Renamon and the Dog Rika.
13333122222211.content:
As the light died down, Rika became aware that several things were suddenly different:

1) She was on all fours,

2) She was completely naked, without even a hairband to keep up her ponytail,

and 3) She was alone in a different part of the park, face first in an overturned trash can - and from the taste of it, her mouth was full of rotten food.

Gagging in surprise, she spat the garbage out and shuffled back, trying to get up and cover herself, only to find that for some reason she couldn't balance on her feet and had to drop back down onto all fours.

"What the hell! What's going on?! Why am I naked and on all fours and eating garbage?! And-" she stopped her screaming as she realized that while she could still understand herself, she was hearing barking. "And why the hell am I barking?!"

Confused and a little scared, Rika started walking, humiliated to be crawling on all fours naked in public, but not seeing any other choice until she could figure out what was going on. She was just grateful that she and Renamon had apparently been the only ones in the park at the time.

"Renamon, where are you?" she called, hoping her partner would have some answers, "Please tell me that stupid card at least left my clothes intact somewhere..."

Rika trailed off, stopping and jaw dropping in surprise, as she found herself back in the part of the park she'd been in earlier and seeing Renamon ahead of her... standing next to a mangy looking dog that was standing upright on its back legs and was wearing her clothes. As she stared in shock, the dog examined the blank card that had caused this mess.

"Well that was weird," the dog said in perfect English, "It doesn't look like that flash actually did anything."

"Are you sure Rika?" Renamon asked, "I can check the area if you want."

"What?!" Rika shouted, snapped out of her shock by that sentence. She ran forward, not even noticing how naturally she moved on all fours as she yelled, "Renamon, are you crazy? I'm Rika, that's just some freak dog in my clothes!"

Renamon and the dog stared at her as she ran up. Then the dog frowned and waved her arms wildly at her.

"Stupid dog. Beat it!"

"I'm not the dog, you are!" Rika shouted.

"She's probably hungry Rika. Look at how thin she is," Renamon commented.

"Well, we don't have any food you mangy mutt. So scram."

Rika ignored the dog in her clothes as she stared in horror at Renamon. "Re-Renamon, you really don't understand me?

Renamon tilted her head and stared at her, but before she could say anything, the dog suddenly grabbed a stick and waved it in front of Rika's face.

"Here. See the stick? Go fetch!" she said, before tossing it a couple of yards away.

Something clicked in Rika's head; despite wanting to stay and somehow prove she was herself, she was suddenly overwhelmed by a desire to chase the stick. She ran after it, eventually reaching it and picking it up with her mouth. She then grabbed the ends with her hands as she started chewing happily on the stick, enjoying the feel of the stick in her mouth. After a few minutes, she came back to her senses; eyes widening, she pulled the stick from her mouth and threw it away, spitting to get the taste out of her mouth.

"Why did I do that?" she asked out loud, "Oh god, am I starting to think like a dog too?"

Looking up, she found to her dismay that Renamon and the dog were gone, with no sign of the weird card; they'd probably taken it with them. Realizing she now seemed stuck like this, she curled up and moaned in despair, the sound coming out like a dog's whining.
13333122222211.title: Rika the stray

choices: ...movement in her bowels. (She has to relieve herself)
...something slip around her neck. (She's caught by a dogcatcher)
133331222222111.content:
After a few minutes, Rika pulled herself together and got back up.

"Okay," she thought aloud, trying to ignore the barking she heard, "I need to find some way to turn back to normal, or communicate with Renamon or one of the others so they can do it for me. I just hope it doesn't come to that - I'd probably die of embarrassment from this nonsense."

Rika grumbled to herself about the humiliating and ridiculous nature of her situation as she started walking, not really paying attention to where she was going or what she was doing; if she had, she would have been disturbed at how natural moving on all fours felt to her.

She was snapped out of her moping by the sound of a car horn. Looking up, she was surprised to see she was now standing on the sidewalk just outside the park, just short of the street. People were walking by, none of them seeming to take notice of the nude girl sitting on all fours just feet away.

Rika blushed at this; while she was grateful that everyone, like Renamon, apparently now saw her as a dog, thus sparing her the embarrassment she'd otherwise be experiencing, the thought of going anywhere with people present in this situation was a little overwhelming. Still blushing, she turned around and started walking back into the park.

'I'll just stay here for now,' she thought, 'Maybe that dog didn't really take the card with her. Maybe she threw it out in one of these trash cans, and I can use it to switch it back. If not... well, at night there'll be less people on the streets, so that's something.'

Her train of thought was derailed by a sudden rustling in a nearby bush. Stopping in her tracks, she turned to look at the bush, her head cocking to the side in curiosity. Her eyes widened as a squirrel popped its head out of the bush, sniffing at the air cautiously. Like with the stick, Rika felt something click in her head, and her eyes narrowed as she bared her teeth and started growling. The squirrel took notice of her and ducked back into the bush.

"Oh no you don't!" she shouted, barreling forward into the bush, so overwhelmed with the desire to catch the squirrel that she completed ignored the resulting scrapes and scratches brought on by the effort.

As she burst from the bush, she looked around wildly until she saw the squirrel heading towards a tree.

"Come back here!" she yelled, continuing the chase. However, the squirrel reached the tree first and started climbing up it. When Rika reached the tree, she jumped up to try and grab the squirrel but missed and fell back to the ground. Growling, she reached up and tried to climb the tree, her hands scratching at the bark futilely.

"I'll get you, you little rat!" she screamed up at the squirrel as it disappeared among the tree's foliage, "I'm gonna get you, I'm gonna get you, I'm... I'm chasing a squirrel."

Rika trailed off and dropped back onto all fours as her mind returned to normal and she realized what she was doing. She groaned as she lowered her head to the ground.

"Oh god, I really am starting to think like a dog! How could this possibly get worse?!"

As if the universe was responding to her question, Rika suddenly felt...

Her barks just irritate the dog catcher, who throws her roughly into the van and into a cage. The catcher locks it in front of her.

She barks again, {Let me out!/i} But the door slams shut on her and she feels the van move. She feels something at her butt. "Oh... no." she says to herself. She looks at the dog, "Leave me alone!" she barks at it. She thinks that she may be a dog now, so she can talk to them at least. The dog perks it's ears up.

choices: To the vet. We don't want to miss your checkup.
13333122222212.content:
As the light died down, Rika suddenly noticed that several things were different:

1) Rather than the park, she was now in the outdoor seating area of a fancy cafe she recognized as being across the street from the park.

2) She wasn't standing or even sitting at one of the tables; rather, she was crouched down on all fours on the floor next to one of the tables.

3) And most importantly, she was completely naked, save for a pink collar around her neck that was leashed to a table leg.

Blushing at her sudden public nudity, Rika yelped and tried to cover herself while leaning back onto her rear in order to cover it, only to find that she couldn't balance for some reason and fell back onto all fours.

"What the hell! What's going on?! Wh-" she yelled, before realizing that while she could still understand herself, she was hearing barking.

"Why am I barking?!"

Suddenly, Rika felt a hand stroking her head; startled, she looked up to see some old woman in a gaudy dress she'd never seen before sitting at the table and looking at her with a slightly concerned look.

"Easy, Princess. Calm down, that's a good girl," she said soothingly. Despite her confusion and mortification at the situation, Rika found herself being strangely calmed down.

"What's wrong with your dog Elizabeth?" another old lady at the table asked.

"Oh, I'm sure it's nothing Maria," the first lady, Elizabeth, replied, "You know dogs - not matter how well bred they are, they still get excited at the littlest things."

This snapped Rika out of her funk, and she glared at Elizabeth.

"What are you talking about?" she snapped, "I'm not a dog!"

Elizabeth responded by smacking Rika on the nose with a rolled up napkin. Rika blinked in surprise, stunned by the action.

"Don't you growl at me, missy, or you'll be sleeping in the yard tonight," Elizabeth scolded.

"I don't believe this," Rika thought, "She actually thinks I'm a dog? Oh god, what did that card do to me?"

Rika could only sit there in shock, until several minutes later Elizabeth said her goodbyes to Maria and got up, unhooking Rika's leash from the table and taking it in hand.

"Come along, Princess," she said, "It's time to go..."

135332212222211221.content:
Renamon slowly regained conciousness. What had happened? She started to remember... This evening, she and her Tamer, Rika, had helped Takato and Guilmon stop a rampaging Volcamon downtown. On their way home, the four of them took a shortcut through the park, where they had found a wierd, green, Digimon Card. Curious about what the Card would do, Rika had swiped it through her Digivice, then there had been a bright flash. Next thing Renamon knew, she was on the ground.

'That was wierd,' thought Renamon. 'The Card didn't do anything. I certainly don't feel like I do when Rika uses Digimodify with other Cards. Exept maybe a little cold; it's rather breezy here...'

As she blinked the stars out of her eyes, she could hear the others had woken up too. 'I wonder what...' Renamon didn't get to finish that train of thought, as two screams suddenly pierced the air. It was Takato and Rika screaming!

Renamon suddenly jumped up on instinct and went into a battle stance. Since her sight had returned, she started looking around to see why her Tamer was screaming. "Rika, are you..." she started to say, but she froze when she saw the sight before her.

Unreal! She couldn't believe it! Yet it was right in front of her. As she looked at the wierd spectacle, she suddenly thought of that cold feeling she had before. 'Don't tell me...' she thought, as she moved her gaze downwards to look at herself.

Even Renamon's diciplined mind didn't prevent her from letting out a gasp of shock, as she unfortunatly found out that her suspicions were right. Her clothes had dissapeared! She was not wearing anything! Well, not completely true. The only piece of clothing on her furry yellow-and-white body, was a pair of long, purple gloves with a Yin-Yang symbol on them. Renamon recognised them immediately. They were Takato's gloves! But other than that, she was buck-naked!

Blushing profusely, Renamon tried to preserve a little modesty by covering her near-naked body with her paws. 'I had a feeling that this was the case,' Renamon thought to herself, 'But it's hard not to be embarassed by this.' She looked up at the two Tamers again, to check on them.

The reason why Renamon had that feeling, was right in front of her and it was why the Tamers were freaking out; somehow they were all wearing each others clothes! Renamon observed that Takato looked like he was frozen in shock; not surprising since he was wearing Renamon's clothes: the white T-shirt, the blue hooded shirt, the yellow wristbands, the long gray shorts, the white socks, the green converse sneakers and the yellow goggles; all of it Renamon's! And Takato was wearing it!

Renamon knew that Takato only ever wore those purple gloves of his; he had for as long as she had known him. So, for him to suddenly wear the full set of clothes of a Digimon, must be uncomfortable for him, she reasoned. Especially since, unlike herself and Guilmon, he didn't know how to properly put on or remove any other article of clothing, that much she knew. And the reason why Renamon knew that she had switched clothes with Takato, was because the same thing had happened to Rika and Guilmon!

Guilmon being, well, Guilmon, was largely unaffected by the whole thing. All he did was just observing everything curiously in spite of him looking funny being completly naked! The same thing could not be said of Rika. The look on her face was an odd mix between shock, anger and disgust. Renamon fully understood why Rika behaved like that. Ever since Rika became her Tamer, Renamon knew that Rika never worn clothes in her life. Rika always felt that any clothes were way too stuffy and uncomfortable for her to wear. Also, like Takato, since Rika never wore clothes, she had no idea how to put them on or take them off.

So, for Rika to suddenly wear Guilmon's clothes would be quite an ordeal for her; Renamon was certain of that. Indeed, Rika looked utterly mortified to be wearing Guilmon's clothes; the hairband, the turquoise-sleaved turtlenecked T-shirt with the dark-blue heart on the front, the short button-fly blue jeans, the red wristbands, the white socks, the red steel-toed sneakers and the buckles that Guilmon usually wore around his waist and left leg. Add in the the fact that, while Rika did consider Guilmon a friend, he was also the Digimon that she was annoyed with the most and the uncomfortable feeling would skyrocket.

For a moment, Renamon just stood and stared like the others. Then Guilmon broke the ice by innocently asking: "Takato, how come you are dressed like Renamon and Renamon dressed like you? And why is Rika dressed like me and I'm dressed like her? Is this some kind of new game?"

Takato managed to snap himself out of his funk, as he shakingly answered: "I-I-I don't know wh-why we're all d-dressed like each other, Guilmon. And no; it's not some new game."

"Awww, too bad," sighed Guilmon. "It looked like it could have been a fun game."

"Fun? FUN?! YOU WOULD CONSIDER THIS TO BE FUN?!?" yelled Rika. Both Takato and Guilmon took a few steps back due to Rika's tone of voice, but Renamon decided to intervene, before her Tamer would start ranting again.

"Calm down, Rika," said Renamon sharply, as she stepped in front of Rika. "It's not Guilmon's fault and you know how hard it is for him to be serious."

"That's still no excuse!" exclaimed Rika. "I mean, look at this!" She tugged on both Guilmon's turtlenecked T-shirt and his button-fly jeans, that she now wore. "I can't stand being dressed in that stupid lizards uncomfortable clothes and all he does is treating it like some kind of circus act!" She pointed at Guilmon, who was currently busy examining how he looked without his clothes on.

Renamon snorted. "So? You think you're the only one here who feels uncomfortable with what you currently wear?" Renamon said. She was fidgeting around, still blushing heavily and trying to cover as much of her near-naked body as possible with her paws. "I don't like being almost naked, but I don't have much choice since Takato is wearing my clothes at the moment." They both looked over at Takato. He was also fidgeting nervously, but in his case, it was from wearing clothes, instead of not wearing them. Looking back at Rika, Renamon added: "But I hope it won't be for long. Wearing nothing but gloves is embarrasing enough, but those gloves also itch to high heaven."

"Hey, speak for yourself!" exclaimed Takato, who had heard what they said. He was scratching himself, as he went over to them. "How can you even wear these things, Renamon? They feel so hot and stuffy. It's like walking around with a blanket wrapped around me, all of the time." He tugged on Renamon's hodded shirt and her long shorts. "If I knew how to take them off, I would take them off. Besides, they aren't really my colour."

"Yeah, I know what you mean," said Rika, as she tugged on Guilmon's T-shirt and blue jeans. "I have no idea how to get this off either."

"Careful you two," said Renamon. "If you keep tugging on the clothes like that, they might rip, and neither Guilmon nor myself would want that to happen." "Right! Sorry!" said the two Tamers at the same time and stopped the tugging for now.

"Hey, how do you guys think we swapped clothes, anyways?" asked Guilmon.

"Well," said Renamon. "I think it might be because of that odd Modify Card we found."

Takato looked over at Rika. "So, you caused this by using that Modify Card!" he yelled at her.

"Hey, how was I supposed to know it would do this?!" Rika yelled back. "It's not like it was written on it that this would happen!"

"ENOUGH ALREADY!!!" bellowed Renamon. The Tamers stopped their bickering immediately. Renamon lowered her voice to a normal level and said: "This is no time to argue! If you want to fix this, then look for the Card. Maybe if you use it again,it will swap our clothes back."

"Good point, Renamon," said Rika, and Takato agreed with her. Without further ado, they all started to look for the Card. But, as it turned out, it had disappeared! Plus, they were wrong about the Card.

Renamon had only been half-right. The Card had swapped something, but it wasn't their clothes. The truth was that they were actually wearing their usual clothes, but the Card had swapped their perceptions on whose clothes belonged to whom; hence why they thought they had swapped clothes.

But, of course, the swapped friends didn't know that, so they continued to search for the Card, until Rika sighed: "It's no use. The Card is gone!" Reluctantly, the others agreed with her. Rika sighed again and looked herself over. 'How CAN dino-breath possibly wear this?' she thought. 'I can hardly breathe with this T-shirt on and my legs feel trapped in those jeans of his.'

Takato thought something similar, as he, too, looked himself over: 'It's a wonder Renamon can handle it. My feet are being squeezed by those sneakers of hers and her goggles feel so uncomfortable on my head.'

"Since that Card is gone," asked Guilmon, "how do we get our own clothes back?"

Renamon sighed. "There's only one choice left," she said. "We'll have to switch them back manually. Rika, you and Guilmon can go behind those bushes over there, and me and Takato can go behind the bushes on the other side." The tamers looked horrified at this prospect, but they knew Renamon was right. Still feeling uncomfortable, the four friends began to walk towards the bushes on either side of the path.

Which pair do we follow first?
135332212222211221.title: The clothes make the man...err...Mon. In a way...

choices: Let's see how Rika and Guilmon handled it
Renamon and Takato begin to discuss what it was like wearing the others clothes
1353322122222112211.content:
While it was only a very short walk to behind the bushes, it was nevertheless extremely awkward for both Takato and Renamon.

Renamon, still blushing heavily, was still attempting to cover as much of her semi-naked body a possible with her hand-paws, but without much success. It did however, result in her walking with an odd kind of waddle. 'I do not understand why Takato likes walking around almost naked and I never will. It's unbearable!' thought Renamon, as she kept waddling towards the bushes. 'The wind keeps messing up my fur and without my sneakers, I can feel every rock or piece of grass that I step on.' She stopped behind the bushes and looked at Takato. 'As least it won't be for much longer.' she thought.

Meanwhile, Takato had problems of his own. Having worn nothing but his long, purple gloves all his life, he wasn't exactly used to wearing anything else, and while Renamon's clothes weren't exactly thight on him, (oddly enough, they seemed to fit him quite well), he still felt uncomfortable wearing them. 'Renamon must be crazy! How can ANYONE even walk around with these things on?!' Takato thought a little angrily, while walking slowly and methodically to lessen the uncomfortablillity of the clothes. 'Her wristbands cover much less than my gloves do and it feels like her long shorts are hindering the movement of my legs.' When he arrived behind the bushes, he saw Renamon looking at him. 'It's a good thing that it won't last much longer.'

Tamer and Digimon looked at each other for about two seconds. Then Renamon said: "So, shall we get started?"

"Gladly," answered Takato and gingerly touched Renamon's hodded shirt that he now wore. "The sooner I get out of these stuffy things, the better."

"Agreed," said Renamon. "But allow me to remove your gloves first, okay?"

"More than okay," said Takato, happy that he would soon be free of Renamon's clothes and get his own gloves back. Renamon began removing Takato's gloves. It was easy; she would just slide them down her arms and take her finger out of the strap and that was it; she was finally free of Takato's itchy gloves. Of course, since she was now COMPLETLY naked, Renamon blushed an even deeper shade of pink. Walking towards Takato, she quickly said: "Now, lets get you out of my clothes, before anyone sees me naked."

"Yeah, that would be awkward," said Takato. As Renamon reached him, Takato streched out his arms towards her. Since he had no idea how to take off Renamon's clothes, she had to remove them for him; they both knew there was no other choice.

Renamon began by removing her wristbands from Takato's arms. As she continued by removing her priced goggles from his head, Takato decided to break the silence.

"Hey, Renamon," he began, after Renamon had asked him to sit down. "I don't understand how you can possibly be comfortable wearing those constricting clothes. They just feel so... restricting to me. It's like trying to move with a set of close-to-skinthight drapes wapped around you."

"Hey, speak for yourself," said Renamon, as she got her green converse sneakers off of Takato's feet. "I can't possibly make it through the day without my clothes; unlike you, I'm used to wearing them. I mean, could you imagine me walking around in public wearing nothing but gloves, like you? I'd die from the embarrasment." she added as an afterthought, while she pulled her socks off of Takato's feet.

Takato thought about this as he stood up again, grateful that his feet were freed from their obstructions. "Hmmm... I see what you mean," he said, as Renamon unbuttoned her shirt which was currently on his body. He was slightly interrupted when Renamon had to pull her shirt over his head to get it off of him, but when that was done, he said: "It would look very wierd if you were to walk around being near-naked. The police might even arrest you for 'public indecency' if that should happen."

"Indeed," said Renamon, while pulling her T-shirt off of Takato. "That's why I wear clothes; to preserve my modesty. And speaking of modesty..." Renamon turned her gaze to the only remaining piece of her clothes that Takato still wore: her long shorts! Takato understood immediately.

"How do I take them off?" he asked her.

"It's simple," answered Renamon. "Just grab the sides of the shorts and gently slide them down your legs." She turned around, her back towards Takato. "Don't worry. I won't look."

Renamon could hear the rustling of fabric, as Takato took off her shorts. But then she heard him gasp: "Uh... Renamon...?"

"What's wrong?" she replied.

"Err..." Takato almost whispered. "About that strange Modify Card that swapped our clothes around? Well... it turns out it was very thorough doing so..."

Renamon's eyes widened, as the gist of what Takato was implying hit her. "Oh, Sovergins..." she gasped faintly. "Don't tell me that the Card..."

"Uh-huh," Takato replied. "It swapped our underwear too!"

Renamon quickly snapped her head around, to look at Takato. True enough; Takato was indeed wearing Renamon's white briefs! Shocked by the sight of Takato wearing HER briefs, Renamon was completely stunned, until Takato weakly said: "Um... Renamon? How do I..."

"Oh, it's the same deal as with the shorts," she said, as she recovered from the shock. Takato got the briefs off in a real hurry and almost trew them over to Renamon, who caught them.

"That was SO gross!" exclaimed Takato shakingly. "I can't believe I was actually wearing your underwear, Renamon!"

"Neither can I!" fumed Renamon, as she clenched her fist. "If I ever see that stupid Card again, I'll rip it in two!"

"Well, look on the bright side," said a now much calmer Takato. "At least we both have our own clothes back now."

"Right," said a mellowed-out Renamon. "Now let's get properly dressed, before anything else happens."

Takato nodded as they went about their task. In Takato's case, it was over fast. All he had to do was to just put the gloves on his arms, stick two fingers inside each of the straps to prevent them from falling of, and that was it. Now he was standing there, feeling the wind caressing his hair and skin and feeling the grass underneath his bare feet, happy that he was once more clad as he usually was and finally being free of Renamon's clothes.

Speaking of Renamon, it took a little longer for her, since she had more to put on. She naturally began by putting on her briefs, sliding them up her legs and stopping just below her tail. Because of her wide hips, they wouldn't be able to slip off. Actually, since the briefs really belonged to Takato, (not that any of them knew that, thanks to the Card), like the rest of the clothes, they were a bit small on her larger frame and so, the front of the breifs didn't quite cover her crotch, (not that there was anything TO see, mind you), and her buttocks weren't fully covered either. Not that she noticed this, mind you; it was all normal to her.

'That's much better,' she thought, as her blushing finally began to fade. 'It's so nice to have my good old briefs back on. If I had gone naked down there for much longer, I would have started screaming.' She placed her hand-paws on her hips in a femenine manner and looked herself over. 'They still look good on me,' she added. Next, she put on the white T-shirt. She managed to squeeze her head and arms through the proper holes in the T-shirt without ripping it, but because of her fur, it could only cover her torso, stopping just short of her stomach.

She then focused on the long, grey shorts. She had a bit of trouble getting them over her legs, but she managed it without ripping them, (but only just), the edge of the shorts touching the base of her tail, just like with the briefs, but only covering 3/4ths of her calves. Then, it was time for the blue, hodded shirt. Again, she managed to squeeze her arms and head through the proper holes without tearing it, (just barely), the hooded shirt covering the same as the T-shirt, though she had trouble with the buttons because of her fur, but she managed to button it regardless.

Renamon sat down, as she put on her footwear. Because of her digitigrade legs, she only had to cover the balls of her foot-paws with the white socks and then pull them as far up her foot-paws as possible. Almost the same thing applied with the green converse sneakers; only the balls of her sock-covered foot-paws needed to be in the sneakers, although they were a bit loose on her.

As she stood back up again, she put on the yellow wristbands. That was easy; just put her hand-paws through them and then up to her wrists. Finally, the yellow goggles. They just went on her head, the rim going under her ears and that was it.

"There! All done!" exclaimed Renamon. Takato heard her and walked over to her.

"Now there's the Renamon we all know and love," said Takato with a grin.

"Same thing to you, Takato," said Renamon. She placed her hand-paws on her hips in a femenine manner and looked herself over, again. "You know, it feels so good to be properly dressed in my own clothes, again."

"You said it!" agreed Takato, while he studied his own long, purple gloves.

But that wasn't true. In fact they were now wearing each others clothes. It was only because of the Card, that they thought that way. And to anyone unaffected by the Card, it would have been a strange sight; a human boy wearing nothing but the oversized gloves of a Renamon and a Renamon squeezed into the too-small clothes of a human boy.

What next?

14.content:
It was a seemingly peaceful day, and in a part of the Digital World, currently lying on the ground was a small, mysterious object. It appeared to be a a black and white rock that had a gray question mark-like symbol on it. This mysterious object was even stranger than most others found in the Digital World, and would cause very strange things to happen to those that found it.

And this mysterious object with strange powers was about to be found, and the one to find it would be the digidestined chosen by the spirits of the spirits of the Legendary Warriors.

The digidestined
Takuya
Koji
Zoe
Tommy
J.P.
Koichi
14.title: Season 4/Frontier

141.content:
It was currently a quiet and peaceful for the Digidestined as they walked through the Digital World. To their relief, they hadn't been attacked lately, and nothing too bad had happened to them. As they did, they all suddenly heard a beeping noise coming from their D-Tectors.

"Woah, whats going on?" Takuya questioned as he and the others all reached for their D-Tectors to see why they were suddenly acting like they were.

"I don't know." Zoe replied.

As they all checked their D-Tectors, they saw radar function activate, and all pointed in the same direction. "It looks like their showing us something is nearby." Tommy said.

"But the question is, what?" Koji said.

"Should we check it out?" J.P. asked.

"If our Digivices are telling us where something is, that probably means we should check it out." Takuya said.

"Or maybe its telling us we should avoid it." Koji said.

"Maybe we should check it out." Koichi said. "Whether its dangerous or not, right now we have no way of knowing what the case is here."

"And whatever it is, I'm sure we can handle it." Takuya said.

"So then I guess its decided." Zoe said. And with that, they all made their way to the location that was being shown to them by their Digivices. When they did, they found themselves in a clearing, and instantly saw the strange rock.

"What is that?" Tommy wondered aloud.

"Dunno." J.P. replied.

"I wonder if it does anything." Zoe wonder.

"Lets find out." Takuya said as they all walked over to it.

Takuya then reached down to pick it up to get a better look at it. As the group took a closer look at it, it suddenly began to glow brightly, and emitted a bright flash of light that engulfed them all.


Now, what will happen to them?

141332211.content:
When the flash died down, the kids were shocked.

Where the children once stood, there were the legendary warriors; Agunimon, Lobomon, Kazemon, Kumamon, Beetlemon, and Lowemon.

"What happened??" asked Zoe.

"We somehow must've Spirit Evolved." said Tommy. He looked at his D-Tector "But we didnt use our D-Tectors."

"Calm down everyone," consuled Takuya "if this is the only problem, we just need to change back"

Everyone nodded...

But, there was a problem....
141332211.title: Instant

1413322111.content:
The freinds took their D-Tectors and pressed the buttons..

...


...

Nothing happened.

They tried again...

Nothing.

They suddenly got a shock of realization. They fratically started pressing the buttons. Whatever combonations they tried, nothing happened.

"Whats going on??" asked Zoe concerned.

"Why cant we change back?" said Tommy, tears forming in his eyes.

"Quiet down everyone," said Takuya as he anime sweatdropped. "Let's settle down and try and figure this out..."

What do they do?
1413322111.title: They cant change back.

14133221111.content: The six freinds quickly set up a small camp. They decided to wait until morning to search fo a cure, or whatever reversal method. Takuya/Agunimon, Koji/Lobomon, JP/Beetlemon, and Koichi/Lowemon layed on their sleeping bags (which somehow grew bigger to support their Digimon bodies) . Zoe/Kazemon sat on the log with her head resting on her hands watching the fire and sighed. Tommy/Kumamon was a distance away, grunting as he furiously kicked a tree. He growled out loud " *grunt* Stupid Digivices *grunt*" Zoe warned "Tommy, your gonna knock yourself out."
14133221111.title: They set up camp.

14133221112.content: What kind of town was it?
14133221112.title: They find a town.

141332211121.content:
It was a industry town full of factories and buisnesses. Clothing stores, department stores, resturaunts, movie theatres, hotels, and more. It looked like a good place to stay, plus, since there were so many Digimon, they would blend in almost too well. "Okay, this looks like a good place to rest. We'll be able to clear our heads and maybe figure something out about what happend to us." said Takuya. The other nodded. "So, are we gonna split up and relax, or do we stay together and have strength in numbers?" asked Tommy.

What do they do?
141332211121.title: City Lights!

1413322111212.content: "I say we split up. Since we are in our Digimon forms and are Champion level, we'll be able to defend for ourselves." said Takuya. "Besides, we need to relax our own ways. We dont have all the same ways to calm down." The others agreed and went down seperate streets. Who do we follow?
