choices: "An autograph would be nice.." (It was one of Tommys fans.)
"I need your help." (It was a bullied Digimon child.))
141332211121221.content:
*Tommys POV*

As I looked around the street, I had a ton of questions on my mind What was going on? How did this happen? Was I going to be stuck as Kumamon forever? I started getting angsty. The Digimon around me bumped me left and right, as if I wasnt there. I heard a voice say "Excuse me.." I immediantly turned around and shouted in fear "WHAT DO YOU WANT??!"

The voice replied.....
141332211121221.title: Tommy

1413322111212211.content:
(Tommys POV)

"An autograph would be nice." said the voice. I opened my eyes. It was a Biyomon. "Oh." I said "sorry for yelling, kid. I was a bit...out there." "Its okay." said the Biyomon. "If your wondering, I'm a fan Mr. Kumamon. You're my favorite of the Lengendary Warriors. Youre so strong and so cute. Can I have an autograph?" I smiled and chuckled "Of course." She handed me a book a photos of me and a pen. I wrote in my best writing 'Kumamon' and handed it back. She thanked me and ran off.

I turned to keep going, but I suddenly yawned. I was somehow tired. I decided to go find a place to rest and maybe think.
1413322111212211.title: Pleased to meet a fan.

14133221112122111.content: I went to a nearby hotel, and at the desk was a digimon that looked black or grey with his back to me. I walked over, kindly asking for a room.
14133221112122111.title: Finds A Hotel

141332211121221111.content: The Digimon turned around and smiled. "Sure," he said "We have a room for you. And since I see you're a Legendary Warrior, it's on us. Heres your key." He handed me a key and i thanked him. I went up to my floor and found my room. I turned the key and entered.
141332211121221111.title: He replies nicely.

1413322111212211111.content:
The room was a model of luxury, like something a superstar would have. There was a king sized bed, a couch, a giant TV and whatnot. I felt both joy for what was here, and sadness because other couldnt have the same, but I brushed it out of my mind. I set my backpack on the bed and sat on the couch. While I sat there, It gave me time to think. What was that rock, and how did it make us into our Digimon? If its possible, how could we change back? Would we even....be able to go home? Tears started forming in my eyes until I cried in fear. I started to lose hope, thinking I was gonna be stuck as Kumamon forever. Suddenly, I remembered what I learned the first time I was in the Digital World, being a crybaby wouldnt help. I wiped my tears and made a straight face. I walked over to the floor mirror and looked. I made my choice...


Tomorrow, I would try my best to find a cure. For Takuya, Zoe, J.P. Everyone. I Promise
1413322111212211111.title: It was pretty....posh.

14133221112122111111.content:
*next morning*

The sun spilled through the window of my room, calmly waking me from my deep sleep. I stood up, steched out my arm and gave a yawn I covered with my other hand. I walk over to the sink and splash some water in my face. I Look in the mirror. Again, I see not my human look but my cute polar bear face.

I give a small smile, as I like being in my Digimon form. I couldn't really explain it. I geuss I just feel....stronger, more confident. I look down a my chubby stomach fat. I put my paws to it and gently squeeze. I give a quiet giggle, as it tickled.

*knock knock*


I hear a knock from the door of my room. I shout out "Coming!" . I run to the door an open it. Standing there was.....
14133221112122111111.title: The next morning.

choices: Say, "How about we meet with the others?"
141332211121221111112.content:
"No flipping way!" I exclaimed, shocked. For standing in my doorway was none other than Marcus Damon, the one human who could go toe-to-toe with Digimon of any level! And he was just standing there, like he hadn't a care in the world. *Huh, didn't think i was that famous." Marcus said. "Well, you did save both the human and Digital worlds." I said. "Last i checked, so did you and your friends. An im sure Lucemon was harder to beat than King Drasil." Marcus said, then asked, "Can i come in?"

I………

1413322211.content:
As the bright light died down, the all looked around in confusion. "Uh, what just happened?" Takuya wondered aloud.

"I'm not sure." Zoe replied. "There was a bright light from that rock that Takuya is holding, but it doesn't look like anything happened."

Before the group could dwell any further in the subject, they suddenly heard noises, and out of from the forest leaped several Ogremon.

"Ready you guys?" Takuya asked the others, who all nodded in confirmation. "Okay then!"

"Execute!" Takuya said and the others all said in unison as they all activated the D-Tectors and used it to scan the data that appeared around their hands. "Spitit Evolution!"

As they underwent the process that changed them, normally, Takuya would become Agunimon, Koji would turn into Lobomon, Zoe into Kazemon, J.P. into Beetlemon, Tommy into Kumamon, and Kouichi into Loweemon, things were not going as they usually did. Unknown to them, the rock that they had found earlier had caused an unsen change to take place. It had caused the Spirits that they had each bonded with to change to one of the other 10 in their possession. Which meant...

"Ranamon!" Takuya said as his transformation finished. Instead of transforming into the Warrior of Flame, which had been his Spirit, he had become the Warrior of Water, which was now the one bonded to him instead.

"Mercurymon!" Koji said. Instead of Light, he was now the Warrior of Steel.

"Agunimon!" Zoe said, now the Warrior of Flame instead of Takuya.

"Arbormon!" J.P. said, now the Warrior of Wood.

"Grumblemon!" Tommy said, who now was the Warrior of Wood.

"Lobomon!" Kouichi said, who was now the Warrior of Light.


As their transformations finished, how do they react?

Once the problem had been dealt with, the six each reverted back to their human forms. But there was more to their swap then they were aware of. Another side effect of the swap that they had unknowingly experienced was that they had also aquired a few personality traits from their current spirts. Since the spirits had been purified, Takuya, Koji, J.P., and Tommy wouldn't suddenly become evil, but their new spirits did give them some other traits. Zoe and Kouichi weren't immune either, and in turn aquired some of Takuya and Koji's traits.

"Well now, that was easy, right y'all?" Takuya said, now speaking femininely and with Ranamon's southern belle accent. From Ranamon, he had aquired the more feminine aspects of her personality such as her vanity and sense of beauty.

"Yeah, they didn't really stand a chance." Zoe agreed, speaking more "boyishly". She now possessed parts of Takuya's normal personality.

"I doth suppose." Koji said, now speaking with Mercurymon's antiquated Shakspearian vocabulary. "

"Me agree." Tommy said, now speaking in broken english like Grumblemon.

"Yeah." J.P. said lazily. Kouichi remained silent.

"Anyway, lets all get goin'." Takuya said, and the group made their way to meet up with Bokomon and the others.

142.content:
It was currently a quiet and peaceful for the Digidestined as they walked through the Digital World. To their relief, they hadn't been attacked lately, and nothing too bad had happened to them. Currently, Takuya and Zoe were walking through the forest together, having been momentarily sepparated from the others. As they did, they all suddenly heard a beeping noise coming from their D-Tectors.

"Woah, whats going on?" Takuya questioned as he and Zoe both reached for their D-Tectors to see why they were suddenly acting like they were.

"I don't know." Zoe replied.

As they all checked their D-Tectors, they saw radar function activate, and all pointed in the same direction. "Whatever it is, it looks like their showing us something is nearby." Takuya said.

"But what could it be?" Zoe asked. "Should we go check it out?"

"If our Digivices are telling us where something is, that probably means we should check it out." Takuya said.

"So then I guess its decided." Zoe said, knowing Takuya had made up his mind. And with that, they made their way to the location that was being shown to them by their Digivices. When they did, they found themselves in a clearing, and instantly saw the strange rock.

"What is that?" Takuya wondered aloud.

"I'm not sure. I wonder if it does anything." Zoe wonder.

"Lets find out." Takuya said as they all walked over to it.

Takuya then reached down to pick it up to get a better look at it. As the group took a closer look at it, it suddenly began to glow brightly, and emitted a bright flash of light that engulfed them both.

Koji, Tommy, J.P., and Koichi run towards them with worried looks on their faces. They quickly stop and try to catch their breath.

"There...you two...are." huffed Koji. "We were worried about you."

"Yeah. You two were gone for a while. What happened?" asked Tommy. "Well...you see..." Takuya begins to explain.

"For some strange reason, we switched bodies." Zoe interrupted.

Koji, Tommy, J.P. and Koichi gave them an awkward stare. "Really. You look and sound the same to me." said J.P. "We're not!" yelled Zoe and Takuya in unison. J.P. remained silent as Koichi walks up towards them. "Well, there is only one way to tell if this is true or not." Koichi said as he looks directly at Takuya (in Zoe's body).

"Alright, Zoe. How do you say Good Morning in Italian?" asked Koichi. Takuya starts to think. "Oh boy. Let me see. Good morning in Italian. How do you say Good Morning in Italian?" he mumbled.

"Buongiorno." Zoe (in Takuya's boddy) said out loud. "Well, it looks like the body switching story is true." said Koichi. "After all, Zoe did live in Italy, so she would know what Good Morning is in Italian."

Tommy looks at both Zoe and Takuya puzzled. "So, Takuya is Zoe, and Zoe is Takuya." He quickly puts his hand to his forehead. "Wow. This is very confusing."

"Besides the point, how did you two switch bodies?" asked Koji. "Well, all I remember is that we were looking at that strange rock." Zoe explains as she points to the rock. "Then, there was a huge bright flash, and when we woke up, our bodies are switched."

"Well, what we need to do is find out how Zoe and I can switch back to our regular bodies." said Takuya. "Right." Zoe nodded in agreement.

"Huh?" Takuya asked, looking down at himself. He was wearing his usual red and yellow shoes, gray pants, yellow shirt, red jacket, brown gloves and hat, and goggles. However, something shifted in his head, and it suddenly seemed to him that this actually was Zoe's outfit.

"I-I don't know," Takuya said, looking back up, his eyes widening in surprise as he looked at Zoe, "Why are you wearing mine?!"

Zoe looked down at herself. Like Takuya, she was wearing her normal outfit of pink and white shoes, dark blue knee socks, pink skirt, blue and white stripped shirt, pink jacket, and pink hat. However, also like Takuya, it now seemed to her that she was wearing her friend's clothes.

Gasping, Zoe blushed bright red as she grabbed the skirt and brought her legs close together.

"What's going on?! Why am I in a skirt?!" she shouted, blushing brighter as Takuya giggled slightly, "Oh shut up!"

"Sorry, you just look ridiculous like that," Takuya said, still laughing. The fact that Zoe was a girl, and therefore there was nothing wrong with her being in a skirt, was apparently lost on both of them.

"Well, what do we do?" Zoe asked, "I don't want to run into the others like this - I'd never hear the end of it.

"Okay, calm down," Takuya said, before looking around and spotting some bushes by the edge.

"Look, why don't we just go into those bushes and change?" he suggested, blushing a little himself at the thought.

Seeing no other choice, the two Digidestined walked into the bushes and separated to opposite sides of a particularly large bush. They then began removing their clothes and tossing them over the bush to each other.

"Oh, I don't believe this - the stupid rock even switched our underwear!" Takuya said, having taken off his pants and looking at his boxers.

"Tell me about it," Zoe said, fumbling with the clasp of her bra. She finally got it loose and tossed it over the bush to Takuya. "I don't know how you wear those things."

"Speak for yourself, I don't know how I was supposed to get around without it," Takuya replied, expertly slipping the bra on, ignoring the fact that he had no breasts for it to hold up.

After a few minutes, the two emerged from the bushes, now having completed swapped clothes, which to their minds now seemed normal.

"Well, that's a relief," Takuya said, smoothing out "his" skirt, "So now what?"

"We should probably try and find the others," Zoe replied, adjusting "her" goggles, "And let's bring that rock. I want to see if Bokomon has any information on it."

"Good idea."

With that, the two picked up the rock and continued on their way out of the clearing.

14513212211.content:
Zoe watched as a digimon she had never seen before entered the clearing. It looked vaguely like a human woman with pale skin, shoulder-length purple-black hair, solid blue eyes, and was wearing a long red dress. She was dragging a cart behind her that contained a sewing machine and what look like a sewing kit.

The digimon paused as she noticed the D-Tector and stone lying on the ground. Picking up the D-Tector, she examined it for a moment before looking around.

"Hello?" the digimon called, "Is anyone here? I think you dropped something."

"Y-yeah, that's mine," Zoe called, stepping forward so she was slightly in view. She was still extremely embarrassed, but it was somewhat better knowing she was talking to a fellow female.

"Oh, my dear! Where are your clothes?" the digimon asked, looking scandalized.

"I don't know! I was just looking at that weird rock, then there was a flash of light and my clothes were gone!" Zoe explained quickly, still blushing brightly. She paused for a moment and then added, "Um, I'm Zoe, by the way."

"The Warrior of Wind?" the digimon asked. When Zoe nodded, she grinned and said, "Oh, but where are my manners? I am Fashionistamon, mistress of fashion, and I must say it would be an honor to help you with your current problem."

"R-really?" Zoe asked, stunned.

"But of course!" Fashionistamon replied happily, "I live to supply fashionable clothing to those who desire it, and even if I wasn't, what sort of lady would leave someone in your condition, even if you weren't a Legendary Warrior?"

"Oh, thank you so much!" Zoe said happily, "I honestly don't know what I would've done if you hadn't shown up."

"Don't mention it, darling," Fashionistamon said as she turned to her machine, "Now just hold still. With my abilities, this should only take a few moments."

With that, she turned her machine on and spools of thread began spinning in the machine before shooting in the air at Zoe and began wrapping around her body. Within moments, the material had begun to take on the shape of clothes. Soon, the machine stopped, and Zoe looked down at herself, surprised to find that she was now wearing...

1451321221112111.content: Zoe looks at her. "Alright then... I guess I do owe you for the dress." she says to Fashionistamon. She smiles, "I knew you'd see it my way, Legendary Warrior, just follow me." she says, carting away her machine as Zoe follows behind. "Where are we going?" she asks curiously as they leave the forest. Fashionistamon smiles, "Assuming you can act professional, you can come with me to a client." Zoe glares at her. "Of course I can!" she tells her. Fashionistamon smiles, "Good." she says, continuing on their way as digimon watch them curiously.
1451321221112111.title: Zoe's a willing maid

14513212211121111.title: The girls arrive at the client's place.

145132122111211111.content: Fashionistamon and Zoe soon across lines of shadows, created by trees on either side of the path. Soon, they come to a large mansion with a variety of digimon going about. They seem tired, but happy. As the girls get closer, a honeybeemon lands in front of them. "Greetings, Fashionistamon! And... human maid..." Fashionistamon nods and, playfully about Zoe, says "Traded her services for her outfit, silly girl." He nods and chuckles, "Even for a human... it must be her attitude." Zoe bites her lip, but Fashionistamon grins, "Oh, that will be fixed free of charge to her." He nods, buzzing. "Mind if I watch her while you speak with Ranamon?" Fashionistamon looks at him, "Well..."
145132122111211111.title: Ranamon

1451321221112111112.content: Fashionistamon shakes her head. "She stays with me." Honeybeemon sighs softly. "Alright, Ranamon will see you." Fashionistamon smiles and nods, taking Zoe inside. Once inside, they see...
1451321221112111112.title: Zoe goes to Ranamon.

choices: Fashionistamon leaves Zoe in the nude.
Fashionistamon leaves Zoe with a different outfit on.
145132122111212.content:
Zoe shakes her head. "I will not be a maid, especially because of a stupid dress and digimon."

Fashionistamon glares at her. "In that case!"
145132122111212.title: She refuses to be a maid.

choices: Zoe waits in the clearing and someone else shows up.
1451321221112121.content:
Fashionistamon snapped her fingers, and suddenly the maid outfit fell apart, turning back into individual threads that flew back into the digimon's sewing kit. Zoe gasped and blushed again, once more instinctively covering herself.

"Hey, what are you doing?!" she shouted.

Fashionistamon sniffed and put her nose up in the air as she said, "Well, if you're not going to use my outfits for their proper use, I'm not going to waste them on you. Good day."

With that said, Fashionistamon began walking out of the clearing.

"Wait, you can't just leave me here! What am I supposed to do?!"

"I suppose, dear, you either wait here for someone else to show up and hope that they're as generous as I was trying to be, or you leave and try to find clothes on your own. Either way, I frankly don't care."

With that, Fashionistamon left, leaving Zoe alone and naked in the clearing.
1451321221112121.title: Fashionistamon leaves Zoe in the nude.

14513212211121211.title: Zoe waits in the clearing and someone else show...

14513212211121212.content:
Not wanting to risk that no one else would show up - or worse, that her friends would and see her - Zoe walked off in the direction Fashionistamon had come from, hoping to find help.

As she walked, covering herself as best she could with her arms and sticking to the bushes, Zoe whimpered as she felt branches scratch at her exposed skin and rocks and roots scratching and poking at her bare feet.

"I swear, I will never take clothes for granted again," she muttered as she pushed through the bushes.

Hearing noise up ahead, she froze, before carefully creeping forward. Sticking her head partway through the bush in front of her, she saw that she was now outside of...
14513212211121212.title: Zoe goes looking for help.

choices: My hands are naturally stuck to my body
145132122111212121.content:
Izumi gulped and saw a village. On one hand, she should be able to get clothes or at least some fabric to cover herself in this village, but there were a lot of people. The business was one of the biggest and most flourishing she had seen. She had no choice but to run to the village and risk being seen. It was better than being seen by her friends... do Digimons even have clothes?

She wondered as she snuck around alleyways looking at merchant shops and finding more food and utilities than anything else. She walked backwards at one alley and bumped into an Andromon. "Excuse me child, why are you covering yourself?"

Izumi thought about whether she should tell the truth or lie
145132122111212121.title: A village

choices: Zoe is wearing a clown outfit.
1451321221112122.content: Fashionistamon glares. "I won't leave you naked... but you don't like this beautiful outfit..." Zoe looks at her, turning to run but engulfed in Fashionistamon's thread and fabric quickly. After a while, she is let go in a new outfit. Zoe shakes as she orients herself, hoping her outfit isn't "too" bad now.
1451321221112122.title: Fashionistamon leaves Zoe with a different outfit.

14513212211122.content: Why did Fashionistamon give Zoe this outfit?

145132122112.content: How about a clown costume?

choices: Fashionistamon's going to have Zoe perform.
14513212211221.content: Just like that, Zoe feels her chest stay cold but her lower body feel warm. She is now wearing a long purple belly dancer skirt, and a beaded top that covers her budding breasts. Zoe covers her chest, blushing red. "What is this?!" she asks the digimon, who is giving her a sly smile.
14513212211221.title: Yes

145132122112211.content:
"Why my dear, I'm going to have you perform, of course," Fashionistamon replied. Ignoring Zoe's shocked expression, she continued, "Hmm, though now that I think about it, I should probably see how good you first. My client would be disappointed if you dressed the part but couldn't act it."

"Are you crazy?!" Zoe yelled, "I'm not dancing for you or anyone else! Especially not like this!"

"Oh darling, you don't have a choice," Fashionistamon said with a smirk.

She snapped her fingers, and Zoe was surprised when her arms started moving on their own. Despite her attempts to stop it, her arms moved until her hands were pressed together above her head. Then, to her further surprise and embarrassment, her hips started swaying, moving back and forth and around in a traditional seductive belly dance, skirt swaying and beads bouncing as she did so.

"Excellent!" Fashionistamon said, clapping, "My client will be very pleased indeed."

"Who's your client?" Zoe asked, blushing as her body continued its seductive dance.

"Why, it's-
145132122112211.title: Fashionistamon's going to have Zoe perform.

1451321221122112.content: How about her own friends?

14513212211222.title: Something else

145132122112221.content: Who's clothes does she get?
145132122112221.title: Yes

145132122112221221.content:
Looking down at herself, Zoe is stunned at the dress. "Oh, just like yours." she says, feeling the fabric and smiling at the Digimon. Don't say anything bad... she thinks to herself. "It looks lovely, thanks." Fashionistamon smiles warmly, "It must be lovely for me to wear it." she says, "You look much more sophisticated in a dress, someone to look up to instead of that tomboyish look you had before.

Zoe looks at Fashionistamon, "It looks pretty, but it's not practical for being a Warrior..." she says timidly, not wanting to insult Fashionistamon. "Right, darling. I suppose I will be on my way." the Digimon keeps smiling, taking hold of her cart again.

14513212212.content:
Yin-YaMon - A very human digimon with half black, half-white split at the growth line styled in twintails that go to her knees. She has one black and one white fingerless gloves. She wears a black kimono that is sleevless and goes to her knees like her hair. he has knee-high socks and sandals. Half of her face iswhite and the other is black. She has the power of luck/karma (she give rewar good and unishes evil...or ivce-versa).

This, or another Original?
14513212212.title: No, another creation

145132122122.content:
Pampermon--
A quadrupedal digimon with lavender fur, 3 rat-like tails instead of one spiky one, a bird-like beak, and a present bow attached to its head like hair. Pampermon's body is similarly built to elecmon and armadillomon, and it is able to temporarily change his body such as: growing his beak, strengthening and growing his tails, and with difficulty changing itself to be more attractive.

Pampermon has a strong desire to please, to the point of spoiling people to his kindness. It will apologize for anything, including being too nice. Pampermon have a spot on their back of white fur. If this is signed by someone with their name or portrait, the pampermon will follow them around and act as a slave. Doing anything they are told or that the signer wants.

Pampermon are not complete slaves to others, however. They are aware that pampering people can be bad, especially when they can do everything for someone. They are known to trick those that sign them into getting them wet and erasing the mark. This lets them leave, and leaves the signer dependent on others that are not as kind. If this fails, they can also pamper someone to the point where they are dependent on the pampermon. Most of the time, their victim can't even order them after a certain point. This lets them control them with basic needs. At this point, the pampermon can ruin their social life and give them no chance of being normal.

(Can be male or female.)
145132122122.title: No, another original.

1451321222.content: A digimon she knows, or a stranger?
1451321222.title: No, some other canon digimon

1451322.content: Does the stone change her into a clown?
1451322.title: No, something else

14513221.content: Does this happen instantly or gradually?
14513221.title: Yes, clown her up!

145132212.content:
Zoe rubs her eyes and drops the stone, which bathes her in a bright white light for a few very long seconds. She looks at herself worried something's happened, at first she thinks she sees her skin has changed color! To her relief, the same white appears on the ground too. Her eyes hurt and everything is white, so she grabs the stone and sits down, closing her eyes to rest them.

After a minute, she opens her eyes. Everything seems fine and it feels good to see colors again. "What did this stone do?" she wonders, looking over her body to see if it did something crazy. But nothing is unusual. "It must be used to blind people." she figures, then giggles at herself. "This will come in handy, maybe if we throw it at a Digimon we can get away." she says, "I need to find the others... or maybe there are more of these lying around?" she wonders what to do.

She starts walking, looking for more of the stones but focusing on getting back with her friends. Her shoes start to feel uncomfortable, like they are shrinking. Zoe crouches down and makes sure everything is alright, becoming very confused as both her shoe and foot feel the same size. "So it also causes foot pain. Great. I need much bigger shoes." she says, the last sentence sounding funny after she says is. "What am I, a clown?" she says with a scoff.
145132212.title: Gradually

choices: Zoe asks for some clown shoes.
She tries Spirit Evolving, maybe the rock only affects her as a human.
1451322122.content:
"Nothing... hmph." Zoe mutters to herself, not seeing anything but grass and rocks as she steps out onto a path in the grass. "It's so hard to walk!" she exclaims, starting to walk flat-footed due to the strange foot pain. Her feet feel heavy and she has to look at her feet to make sure nothing is changing on her. "What did that stupid rock do?" she wonders, kicking the grass in frustration and tripping on her own feet.

"Ow!" she yelps, looking around. "Nobody saw me." she says disappointed. She puts her hands to her mouth, "What's with me today?!" Zoe puts her hands on the ground and pushes herself up, noticing it's hard to stand up too. "Something is going on..." she looks around before standing up straight. "I am Zoe, my shoes fit me." she says slowly and quietly, "I am Zoe and my shoes fit me." she repeats a little faster and louder, then she smiles. "I am Zoe, clown shoes befit me." she says without thinking about her words so hard, blushing softly at what she just said. "That stupid rock must be doing it." she throws the rock hard to her left in frustration.

Nearby, she hears some unfamiliar voices laughing. Once she looks in their direction, a Tentomon flies out and stares at her. Zoe gasps in surprise and grabs for her D-Tector reflexively, not using it however. Tentomon seems to smile, "I'm curious why you are yelling, little girl." He looks at her feet as she replies, "I found a rock and now it makes me say weird things." she explains, and Tentomon nods. "I see, why don't you give into it until you get some real help, hm?" Zoe stares at him, "How do I know you didn't put the stone there?" Tentomon shrugs, "I saw some other humans pass by a while ago, with that stone frustrating you it might be a long lonely walk." Zoe sighs and nods, "Fine."
1451322122.title: She finds the path.

choices: Tentomon has more clown stuff for Zoe
Zoe says goodbye to Tentomon and goes off to find the others
14513221221.content: "Do you have any clown shoes I could wear?" Zoe found herself asking the Tentomon. "Sure, wait here," the Tentomon said as it flew back in the direction it had come from. Zoe sat down and took off her shoes, rubbing her feet to try and ease the pain. "Here you go," Tentomon said, handing her a pair of very large clown shoes. Zoe reluctantly put them on, finding that they were much more comfortable than her other shoes. "Well at least these don't hurt my feet, thank you," Zoe said with a slight giggle. "This doesn't seem so bad," she thought to herself. "Maybe being a clown would be fun!" She slapped herself for thinking that. Tentomon just smiled as Zoe got up and walked around in her new shoes.
14513221221.title: Zoe asks for some clown shoes.

choices: He'd rather not talk about it.
He has always wanted a clown to entertain him.
145132212211.content:
Watching her walk, the Tentomon chuckles, "If you want more clown stuff, I'd be happy to give you the full ensemble." Zoe turns around, feeling so comfortable in these shoes she's willing to consider it. "I'll have to see it." she says, walking over to him with a spring in her step.

The insect Digimon leads her to a closet, and pulls out all manner of things. A rainbow wig, a suit, gloves, even different kinds of some of the articles. As she notices how much of this stuff he has, she asks "Why do you have so much clown stuff... especially since none of it fits you?"

The Tentomon looks her in the eyes as he responds.
145132212211.title: Tentomon has more clown stuff for Zoe

145212.content: Maybe he becomes a she?
145212.title: TG?

1452121.title: Yes

1452122.content: Perhaps Tommy keeps some of his Spirit after changing back? Such as his fur or paws.
1452122.title: Spirit Remnants

14521221.content: What should he keep after turning back to a human?
14521221.title: Yes

145212212.content: Perhaps he keeps his spirit's furry ears?
145212212.title: Others

choices: Trying to find out what happened
Talk to the others about it
1452122121.content:
The group had been resting in a small forest near a river. After a short bath in said river, Tommy notices a small, shimmering stone near a tree where he left his clothes. Just after he picks it up, it vanishes into thin air.
"Strange" is all he thinks while getting back to the others.
Before he could talk about the strange stone, they are attacked by a group of Gazimon.

The battle is over in a couple of minutes, the six of them had all H-spirit evolved and finished them of quickly, purifying them.
After devolving back, they don't notice that they can't see Tommys human ears below his cap.
Tommy himself only notices that his cap is a slowly slipping over his head, but he doesn't think much about it at the moment because like the others he his tired.
One after another, the group fall asleep with Koichi keeping the first watch.

In the morning Tommy is the first to wake up, greeting an half asleep Takuya who had the last watch that night and walks over to the river to wash his face. Only after getting water in his face he notices something strange and looks into the water at his reflection.
After that, he is shocked. "What happened?" was all he through about right now.
1452122121.title: Yes, the ears for now

14521221212.content:
After a couple of minutes starring at his ears Tommy decides to talk to the others if they have an idea why and how this could have happened to him. So he walks back to the others.
The others were in the process of waking up when Tommy returned. After getting over the look of Tommy, they tried to find answers to the how and why, but nothing seems fitting. Even Bokomons book had no information.

"You could try to spirit evolve and devolve. Maybe that would give you back your own human ears." That was an idea of Koichi after half an hour of trying to find answers.
So Tommy gives it a try.
14521221212.title: Talk to the others about it

choices: Tommy changes every time he evolves
145212212122.content:
Tommy evolved to Kumamon, waits for a minute before devolving back.
Just after the D-codes vanish into thin air, the others gasp. "What now?" asks Tommy and feels his ears, still Kumamons.
After a couple of seconds, Takuya hesitantly answers "Its not just the ears now, Tommy. You have Kumamons nose as well."
Shocked, Tommy feels his nose and yes, its not his human nose anymore. After trying to see it by squinting his eyes, he runs back to the river to see his face.
While he is away, the others stand there, still not sure what is happening to Tommy.

After returning a short time later, Tommy looks like he is about to cry. "Hey, Tommy. We will find a way to get you back to normal. There must be a reason for this." Zoes words were helping, Tommy braces himself. "You are right, there will be a way. I just hope that this was the last part of it."

So after a short breakfast, they go on with there journey.
145212212122.title: There are other changes

1452122121221.content:
That day went by uneventful.
By the time they went to sleep, Tommy hopes that the changes will go back while they are asleep.
This hope is crushed in the morning when nothing had changed.
"At least I haven´t changed more"
Shortly after starting walking again, they were attacked by two Skullmeramon. But staying back was no longer Tommys way of action, so he evolves alongside the others, choosing his B-spirit Korikakumon this time. The fight only lasts five minutes before the Skullmeramon were purified.
After devolving it is JP who looks shocked at Tommy. Seeing him, the others turn to him as well, looking the same as JP after seeing him.
"What now?" asks Tommy while he touches his face. His ears and nose feel the same as they had yesterday, still Kumamons.
"You have kept Korikakumons horns in your hair, next to your ears." Koichi explains there shocked looks. Tommy just touches the horns. Now he looks unhappy.
"Do I have to keep something from my spirits every time I evolve?" He is ready to cry now. He was hoping that it was over or just Kumamons spirit.
1452122121221.title: Tommy changes every time he evolves

14521221212212.content:
After some time, Tommy calms down.
"Tommy, maybe you should not fight with us the next time. Maybe your changes will go away if you don't spirit evolve." Koji suggests.
"I don't want to be useless." "You can protect Bokomon and Neemon while you are hiding with them, then you won't be useless. We won't judge you because we don't want to see you suffer through your changes." The others were nodding to this.
Not very happy with this decision but accepting it, Tommy stopped fighting alongside the others. That day they had to fight twice before reaching a small village were they stayed for the night. Tommy was hiding his ears and the horns with his cap. Through the horns the cap doesn't slip anymore, on upside of them. Only his nose was seen, but the Digimon in the village gave this little detail no mind.
14521221212212.title: He stopps fighting, for now

choices: The others try to change his mind
145212212122121.content:
For a week Tommy was hiding with Bokomon and Neemon, watching the others fight and get hit. But that was enough for him to be fed up with that decision. The changes had stopped, but weren't going away. And seeing the others get hurt was only adding up to this. In the last fight the others had, JP had jumped in an attack just to protect Tommy, Bokomon and Neemon and that had been the last straw.
So in the next fight they had, Tommy made his decision and evolved to Kumamon before the others could stop him. The Blackgreymon who had attacked the group was down in mere seconds without anyone beside Tommy evolved. That only showed the others how angry Tommy was with the no fighting decision.
After devolving Tommy had lost his cap, switched with Kumamons headgear. The horns were just above it, now clearly seen between his hair.
This time however Tommy feels that something is wrong on his head and after quickly putting his hands up, he knows what had changed this time.
But one thing was sure for him, he won't sit on the sidelines just to not change anymore. And the others could say what they want, his decision was clear.
145212212122121.title: A week later

choices: The next change won't wait for long
Stay in the village and try to find a way to get back to normal
1452122121221211.content:
Slowly over the next days, Tommy comes to accept some of his changes. Because of Kumamons nose and ears, he had a better sense of smell and his hearing had improved.

A week after getting his cap changed into Kumamons headgear, the next fight came in form of three Vajiramon that were attacking some village on their way. The group all B-spirit evolved and saved the village from the trio.
This time after devolving, the change of Tommy was not on his head. This time, he lost his shoes and socks like he had with the cap, because his feet were changed to the ones of Korikakumon.
After getting used to his now for the human body heavier and bigger feet, Tommy wasn't sure if it was a good or a bad change. But in the next evening, he sees one positive thing.
"While it is strange to walk a whole day, my feet doesn't hurt as they would normally in my shoes after walking this much. It's just to keep away from sharp stones, because even if the soles are thicker then normal I still feel them sting." But now there was one other downside. Because of the now bigger feet, it was much more difficult to remove his pants without shredding them with his claws.

The others had tried to keep him from fighting, but he won't hear them on that.
1452122121221211.title: The next fight will come

choices: He still keeps fighting with the others
14521221212212111.content:
It had been two weeks since the last fight for Tommy. He had accepted that in smaller fights he should keep back and let the others fight. Not that there had been more than three fights in this two weeks, and none had been longer than a minute.
They also tried to find a way to change him back in every village by asking around, but nothing had come up. The only thing that they found out yesterday was that there should have been a trigger somewhere, but Tommy couldn't think of anything in the evening. The stone was long forgotten.

Just after leaving the village the next morning they were attacked by a group of ghostdigimon, two Phantomon and five Bakemon, who would have attacked the village this night if not for the group. The fight took half an hour for them all with their B-spirits because of how often the ghosts evade their attacks by just go through a tree. The warriors had not wanted to destroy the forest the village was in, so their attacks where limited. In the end the warriors had them surrounded and defeated.

After devolving this time Tommy keeps the hands of Korikakumon, something he says later is not that bad. "They are just bigger then normal. Only with the claws i should be careful not to hurt one of you or myself." Only that with the changed hands and feet he looks very disproportional because they are bigger than his arms or legs.
14521221212212111.title: The next change won't wait for long

145212212122121111.content:
Despite his comment on the changed hands, Tommy needed more than a few hours to get used to them. When they were eating later that day, he had scratched his cheek bloody. In the evening he helped getting firewood, only to break a few branches now and then. So after the group get their fire started, Tommy starts practicing to work with his hands more before the group went to sleep.

Even now the others had not stopped trying to keep him away from fighting, but he is stubborn.
"What if after some fights there is nothing human anymore on your body Tommy? We don't know how to get you back to normal, and maybe it is only possible to change back if you have still some human parts on you?"
"I don't believe that. Maybe its the other way around and I only can change back if I'm fully changed? Without more information we don't know this. And I won't stay back."

Shortly after that, they came across some half burned village with some Asuramon attacking. Tommy, enraged by thinking back about the Asuramon in Sephirothmon, evolved faster than the others to Korikakumon and attacks them. Tommy took half of the group alone while the others took the rest. After the last Asuramon is defeated, Tommy switched to Kumamon to get the fires down.
After devolving this time, Tommy face had changed once more. He now had the snout of Korikakumon but still with Kumamons nose, while on his cheeks were the orange stripes of Kumamon. On top of his snout were the same markings that Korikakumon had there, just below the headgear of Kumamon. And all around his face was Kumamons snowy white fur. The only thing still human on his head now was his hair.
145212212122121111.title: He still keeps fighting with the others

choices: Start looking for the second rune-stone
1452122121221211111.content:
That evening after helping the villagers to move the debris out, they got the offer to eat and sleep in the village.
While eating in their small group, JP got an idea and turned to Bokomon.
"Bokomon, in your book where pages to the H- and the B-spirits, right? Was there one of the double-spirit-evolution, too?"
While Bokomon took out his book to look, the others were looking at him inquiring.
"Look at what happened to Tommy, he is beside his own body looking like a mix between Kumamon and Korikakumon. Aldamon looks like a mix between Agunimon and Burninggreymon and Beowulfmon looks like a mix between Lobomon and Kendogarurumon. What if his changing form has something to do with him being able to double-spirit-evolve?"
While Tommy got excited from that idea, the others started thinking about it. "It is an interesting idea. And Bokomon should look in the book if there is a picture of that form?"
"That or if there is written something about anything like a trigger that is responsible."

Then Bokomon finally gave them an answer. "There is no picture of any of that forms, but there is something about some triggers. One way is the one that Takuya and Koji took, getting it granted by the power of one of the angels. A second way would be time. Its mentioned that if someone has the spirits for a long time, there could be signs that this option is given to you. The third mentioned way is to get an object like an orb or a rune-stone as trigger and a second one for the final result."
Now they looked all at Tommy. "I think its not the time way. None of us had the spirits that long. And if it had been the power of the angels, it would have happened instantly like Takuya and Koji."
Tommy through about it before getting it. "Shortly before we saw the first change, we took camp near a river. On my way back there was some glowing stone, but after I took it from the ground it vanished. And after getting back there was the fight, so I forgot about it."
"Is there something why you need two objects?" "If you only have one object then you don't have access to your attacks and if you reach the final form then you can't change with the spirits any longer."
"That would mean if I'm completely changed I'm no longer able to fight with you." "If you get Korikakumons battle axes you could fight in near combat. You only have no attacks and no way of changing.
1452122121221211111.title: Some idea about what happened

14521222.content: Tommy starts growing older, around the same age as Takuya, Koji & Koichi

1452222222221221211.content:
The group of six was building a camp for the night.
They decided to stay here because Tommy had fallen into a small lake and his clothes were soaking wet and it was getting dark slowly.
Tommy was sitting near the campfire, wrapped into a blanket with only his underwear while his other clothes were slowly drying.

After eating something, they all went to sleep, Koichi keeping the first watch that night.
Later that night, a small group of Digimon slowly invades the camp.
A Tapirmon uses his powers to get Koichi to sleep and keep the others sleeping for now.
Makuramon, the leader of the small group then took all their D-Tectors away before the five Gorillamon took everyone except Tommy to hold them still.
"Tapirmon, let the five of them wake up, but keep the small one asleep."

Slowly, the five wake up, but are wide awake after becoming aware of their situation.
"Ah, the famous legendary warriors are awake now. Good then we shall begin to get rid of you. Or better, get you out of the way and maybe later get you to our side."
With that, he and the Gorillamon start to laugh and even Tapirmon giggled a little.
"We would never work with someone like you" Takuya spit out.
"You think so? We have many Digimon that said that they would die before working with us, but we have our ways to change that.
You see, if a Digimon shows his D-Codes you can scan them to eliminate the danger. But you can also split the D-Codes into parts to work with. For the soul it is a torture and slowly the will of the Digimon collapse. If you put it together again, it will work, if only to not feel that pain again."
"But if you split them up, would that not kill the Digimon? And what are you doing to the parts?" Takuya asks shocked.

"Oh, you will not die as long as all parts remain intact by themselves. The parts can be changed when other D-Codes are added to them part. You can change the body into an object, maybe a rock or a tree an let it be exposed to the weather. You can put the consciousness into some equipment like armor or weapons and all hits it takes can be felt. As long as not all parts are connected, there is no way the Digimon can put itself together. And humans are the same."
While Makuramon and the Gorillamon were laughing, the warriors were completely shocked.
1452222222221221211.title: Clothes

14522222222212212111.content:
After Makuramon calmed down he says: "Now lets start with the whole process. We have already chosen what we will do with you."
And with that, Makuramon hits Takuya so that his D-Codes were open to see. He then hits the D-Codes in two spots, splitting first Takuyas consciousness from his body. He put the ghost-like image of Takuya next to him so he could see what would happen next.
Then he took a stone from the ground and shows the D-Codes of the stone before hitting the D-Codes around Takuyas body at another spot, then taking one part of the split up D-Codes between both hands to slightly compress them before putting them into the stone.
They all watched in horror as Takuyas body went completely limp in the Gorillamons hold while the stone slightly grows.
After this, he did the same to Koji, Koichi, J.P. and Zoe.

"Before you ask, we took all what was inside of your body into the stone. That way, you will have no way to get it back without help and that part is save from damage as long as we keep it in a save spot. Now, to work with the bodies."
Makuramon walks over to the clothes of Tommy and took them back to the group.
He then puts the D-Codes of Tommys cap into Takuyas body. Slowly, the body sinks completely into Takuyas head, while all the features on the head slowly vanish into it. Only the mouth starts to grow, becoming the opening of the cap.
Next he does the same with Zoes body and Tommys shirt. The arms, legs and the head sink into the body, and leaving an opening to put the new shirt on.
Tommys pants went into J.P.s body, where his feet and head vanish into the lower part of the body leaving equal holes for putting it on while the arms turn into the suspenders.
Tommys right shoe and sock went into Koichis body while the left shoe and sock went into Kojis body. Like Takuyas, their whole bodies sink into the head and turning the open mouth into the opening for the feet within the sock and shoe. Their hands changed into the fasteners of Tommys shoes.
After the changes have finished, all the bodies turned clothes float slowly to the ground.

"So, and now the final touch." With that, Makuramon took the consciousness of everyone back into their bodies now turned clothes and put them back where they were before and putting their D-Tectors next to the clothes.
"You will have all your senses to feel everything, but your friend will not know that you are with him, no way to contact him, nothing. We will see if he can rescue you before you lose the fight of your will.
Oh, and one final thing. Every time he digivolves you will change along the forms. You will be part of the fights after all."
With that, the group laughs again before returning to the forest, leaving Tommy all alone with his friends turned clothes.
14522222222212212111.title: Lets start

151.content:
It was a seemingly ordinary and peaceful day in the real world, with no recent Digimon having appeared and caused trouble. However, things wouldn't stay that way for long, as a strange object suddenly fell out through a small hole that appeared right in the middle of the air. It was a small black and white sphere with a gray question mark-like symbol on it. This mysterious object was even stranger than most others found in the Digital World, and would cause very strange things to happen to those that found it.

And this mysterious object with strange powers was about to be found, and the one to find it would be those of the Data Squad.

info.brief_description: Digimon characters find a strange object that causes them to undergo strange changes
info.description:
The characters of the many Digimon series undergo changes. Physical, mental, any kind really. Just keep things consistant. Also, the changes don't always need to affect everybody. They can also swap lives or turn into characters from other anime series or video games.

As for changes, don't always try to make everything lead to the same conclusion. Be creative and with similar stuff, don't always make it go the same direction as other paths.

Also, unless teleported away from them like into another world, try not to ignore their Digimon partners if they're present. At least at the start of things, a person's partner digimon wilbe present. Whether its affected by anything or not is up to the options.

No sex
No killing off characters
No ending the story
Please try to have good grammar and such

And of course, have fun!
